name: Cozy and peaceful apartment in lovely Poble Sec.
description:
Cozy apartment completely renovated right next to the peaceful Montjuic hill, within the trendy and upcoming Poble Sec's area and walking distance to practically everywhere. 20 minutes from the sea front.
1st floor with elevator (it is in fact a 3rd level).
The apartment is located in the old town in a real catalan envoirnment. It's a lively area with bars and good restaurants near by. However, thanks to its position once at home you wil be in a peaceful and silent environment.
neighborhood_overview:
When I first moved to Barcelona, eight years ago, I instantly knew that I wanted to be in Poble Sec. It is very central, however it feels like staying in a small village. There is plenty of small coffee shops, groceries, restaurants, supermarkets and cash points. Also it has trendy bars where you can chill out with a nice cocktail.

Just behind my apartment there is the lovely Montjuic Hill, where you can walk and discover amazing views of the city, the Botanic Garden, the Castle, etc
Or enjoying an afternoon at the famous bar with view named Marcelino.

And at walking distance the lovely barrio of Sant Antoni, with coffee shops, trendy restaurants and the stunning market which just re-opened in May 2018 after a 10 years total rejuvenation and modernization.

name: MODERN 2-BEDROOM APARTMENT GRACIA
description: Stay in Gràcia, the most bohemian and cosmopolitan neighborhood in Barcelona that has also managed to preserve its lifelong neighborhood spirit.
neighborhood_overview:
This 2-bedroom apartment is fully furnished. The 70 m² property has a balcony, a living room with sofa and dining table, an equipped kitchen, and 1 bathroom. The apartment is equipped with heating and A/C.
The Joanic metro station, which serves line L4, is a 5-minute walk from the apartment.
host_about:
Somos unos apasionados de los viajes. Tanto, que ¡nos hemos convertido en profesionales! 

Estamos muy orgullosos de haber empezado alquilando apartamentos en Barcelona a viajeros nacionales e internacionales. Llevamos más de una década alquilando apartamentos a familias, grupos de amigos, parejas... y realmente siempre ha sido una experiencia muy gratificante para nosotros. Cuando viajamos con nuestros niños, o cuando podemos escaparnos un fin de semana solos, es la opción de alojamiento que más nos gusta. Tenemos independencia, comodidad, conocemos muchos anfitriones nos enriquecen con sus historias y consejos sobre la ciudad y vivimos la ciudad casi casi como un local más.

Nos gusta sentirnos a gusto cuando viajamos, por eso es lo que intentamos ofrecer siempre a nuestros huéspedes. Tenemos un pequeño equipo que nos ayuda para lograr una mejor atención y que se esfuerza por hacer de la experiencia lo mejor posible. 

Esperamos verte pronto! Y no dudes en contactarnos para lo que necesites. 

Lodging Team

name: PRIVILEGED LOCATION and A LOCAL EXPERIENCE
description:
Dear travellers. We welcome you with open arms to our lovely apartment in the heart of Barcelona.
Although central, the neighbourhood is very Spanish and all main amenities, as well as the beach, are few steps away.
We are a young couple with lot of travelling experience who clearly understand the importance of feeling at home once staying at a place. And making you feel at home is our purpose. Welcome!
neighborhood_overview:
El Clot is a central and lovely Spanish neighbourhood, allowing you to access all main amenities easily while still escaping the touristic prices and traps.
From here you have great infrastructure (also trains directly to the airport), a park, local Spanish bars and restaurants and a walking distance to all main monuments of the city.
host_about:
Dear people.

Outgoing, philosophical and always eager to learn - these are few adjectives that I would choose to describe myself. Just like everybody else, my characteristics and values are shaped by life experiences and people around me. 
I would happily welcome new connections since I believe we all have things to learn from each other.

Please feel free to contact me if you have anything on your mind.


Regards.

host_about:
Habitat Apartments is a professional vacation rental agency with 19 years of experience welcoming guests to the city. We have been awarded, 4 years in a row, "Spain's Leading Serviced Apartment Brand" at the World Travel Awards.

How we do it?
- We work with a professional cleaning & laundry company so you will find the apartment well prepared for your stay. We also work with a professional maintenance company available at any time.

- We are available 24 hours a day, 7 days a week, 365 days a year so you can rest assured that you will be taken care of in case of an emergency during your stay in Barcelona.

- We know the city so well because it's our home so you can ask us anything you need before & during your stay.

We want you to love our city as much as we do and go home with the best memories!

The situation of the apartment is ideal for those who want to live in the city center. We are located next to the Ramblas, in the Raval neighborhood, a very active area of Barcelona. Just next door you'll find Plaça Real and Plaça Sant Jaume, the Boqueria market and Plaça Catalunya - Portal de l'Angel shopping area. The port is a 5-minute walk and the Barceloneta beach is a 20-minute walk or 10 minutes by bus.
Just in front of the apartment there is a supermarket, and on the same street there is a pharmacy, bars and restaurants.

The apartment is located in the center of Barcelona near the most famous points of interest in the city.
Just a 10-minute walk away is the historic Sagrada Familia. At the same distance there is also the Arc de Triomphe followed by the wonderful Ciutadella Park.

neighborhood_overview:
The Illa del Llac complex is a calm, relaxing location perfect for families and friends who seek a quiet place always at a step of Barcelona's amusement, shopping and cultural offerings. Also great for convention or concert assistants, as the apartment is only 100 meters away from the CCIB and the Forum area.

The Diagonal Mar shopping center next to the apartment hosts most of the shops you need. It has also many different restaurants and a cinema so you can have amusement near the apartment. And you're always just 20 min away from the heart of Barcelona!

For nightlife there is the Hilton’s Purebeach club and is not far (less than 10min taxi) from Shoko, CDLC and Opium clubs.

host_about:
Hi I'm Laia,

I'm from Barcelona; as were my  parents, grandparents and great-grandparents, as far back as I remember! I am a lover of my city, but of the original city of Barcelona, the whole gothic and Eixample area is spectacular!

I worked previously in communication and creativity, but for some time now I decided to use all my creativity in creating furniture and decoration. Restore anything that people do not want as they think it is useless or old or broken, I look for new uses for them so that they don’t die and remain among us.

I am delighted and 100% available to give directions and suggestions about my city! Here I´ll give you the first, advice... watch your bag! Catalans are very good people, but we also have one or two thieves…well, many actually !
 
I hope you ll feel at home in my apartment and enjoy very much the city!

See you soon!!
Laia

description:

You will have a private bathroom (out of the room), small but with a large shower.
You'll live with us and our two cats.

We can often offer guests to check in after 3pm or even early check in.
neighborhood_overview:
It is a quiet and safe residential neighborhood. You won't live in the center of the city, but as we live by the subway, you'll quickly get everywhere. The apartment is on a well-lit main street next to the Maragall metro.
There are numerous cafes, bars, pharmacies, two hospitals and a spacious 7000 m2 park near the apartment.
The nearest supermarkets are Aldi, 1 minute away, and Lidl, 3 minutes away. 5 minutes away there is a 24-hour supermarket.

neighborhood_overview:
This is my first apartment. I chose it for its light and the quietness and security that the neighborhood offers. Also because of the good connection of the area by public transport.

host_about:
Hi!

I am Neus and, like you, I love to travel! 

I’ve visited all the continents, discovering places, knowing cultures and sharing experiences. I’ve taken many pictures on the camera and some images on my retina. I've also known people who are great friends now.  

Actually, with a child and a momentary break from my traveling adventures, I spend my free time planning the next one.

And because I’ve felt the pleasure of staying at a clean and comfortable place when I’ve been away from home, I try to make my apartment as cozy as I like to find the places when I’m abroad.

I hope to meet you soon!

name: BARCELONA | RIGHT NEXT TO SAGRADA FAMILIA | ¤
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is situated only 2 minutes walking distance from the Sagrada Familia. It is recommended to spend an entire morning or afternoon to visit Barcelona's best known monument. Moreover, the bullfighting arena Monumental is only a 5 minutes' walk away.

The city centre of Barcelona (the Ramblas, Barri Gotic, Plaza Catalunya…) is only 5 minutes by Metro (Line 2, three stops). The elegant Passeig de Gracia, with tons of shops and restaurants, is only two metro stops away (3 minutes).
Enjoy an apartment with great location in a safe area, excellent connections, right next to the Sagrada Familia.
host_about:
Hi there,

My name is Enrique and I am a Barcelona Local. I have always loved traveling myself, but also sharing the beauty and wonders of Barcelona with others, so a few years ago I started renting out 2 apartments to travelers coming to the city, always meeting everyone in person so I could share my insights and hidden secrets about Barcelona :)

Now I rent out a few more apartments and it is no longer just me, but we are a small team of people managing the apartments together, but with the same focus on personal and attentive services in authentic apartments that allow for the genuine Barcelona feel for your trip! We call our little team Stay U-nique, because of this focus on a unique feeling when staying with us.

If you have any questions, want to hear about an apartment or just say hi, don´t hesitate to reach out :)

Have a great day!
Enrique

description:
Private room in Barcelona Center, closed to Las Ramblas and Plaza Cataluña (Ciutat Vella). 4 minutes away from nearest subway station.

This area has plenty of kebab restaurants, Italians, Chinese buffets, Pizza, takeaways & other places to eat.

The place has three rooms, kitchen, shared bathroom, balcony, washing area, small hall and living room. One room for my mother and another rented room for two people.

No problem with late night flights.

Towels, soap, shampoo and WI-FI available.
neighborhood_overview:
El Raval is the neighbourhood I live and it is a vibrant place filled with flavours, colours and environments from around the world. Keeping at the same time the beautiful buildings and parks that make it unique in Barcelona.

Location is very central and good to discover landmarks like Plaza Catalunya, Las Ramblas and Montjuïc.

Plaza Catalunya is 10 min on foot. It is considered the city center. It is a beautiful square with nice fountains and ornaments. Close to shopping areas like El Triangle shopping center and Paseo de Gracia promenade full of world known clothing shops.

Las Ramblas is the most famous promenade in Barcelona that goes from Plaza Catalunya to the Columbus monument by a seaport.

neighborhood_overview:
Interested in stay in Les Corts? Then take your best soccer tricks with you, because you will be a resident of the emblematic neighborhood of F.C. Barcelona. And not only that. Les Corts is also one of the most important financial districts in the city, so don't rule out running into business people strolling through its streets.

Les Corts is not one of the most picturesque neighborhoods, but it is still a very fashionable place. Why? Because from here you have access to great facilities and it's quite close to the city center.

Les Corts is an important financial business district in Barcelona and therefore has many good hotels and restaurants. Also, on Diagonal, there is a large shopping complex called L'Illa. In L'Illa there are several good restaurants, a huge supermarket, a small exhibition centre and of course lots of clothes shops, including some of Barcelona's favourites such as Purificacion Garcia, Zara and Custo.

name: Design 1 Bed Apt cerca de Plaza España
description:
My one-bedroom flat is located in the Eixample! It's just a seven-minute walk from Plaza España, so you can explore Montjuic.

The nearest metro station is just a six-minute walk away, so discovering Barcelona couldn't be easier.
Enjoy your stay!
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is located in the Eixample, the most emblematic neighborhood in the center of Barcelona. You will be located in a charming area with the best of Barcelona's modernism next to elegant shops and boutiques. Main landmarks include Gaudí's stunning Sagrada Familia and Plaza Catalunya, where shopping addicts will find a variety of retail chains and boutiques offering the latest trends.

You will have many opportunities to taste the typical Spanish and Catalan cuisine in the restaurants that populate the area. They include the revered Teoric Taverna Gastronomica, where glowing reviews are proof of the high-quality Mediterranean dishes on offer, and Don Kilo Barcelona, ​​an extremely popular restaurant serving Italian classics.

This neighbourhood is well connected to the city's main attractions and offers excellent public transport connections, so enjoy the area knowing that other exciting neighbourhoods in Barcelona are within walking distance!

SE
host_about:
I love to explore other parts of the world, meet new people and discover new cultures. My hobbies are the cinema, theatre, dance and performing arts. 

I’m in love with Barcelona, the city where I was born, and I love to show it to my friends.

BARRIO

description:
Casa Kessler located in a chic and charming Art Nouveau building. Its exclusive mezzanine has original floors and ceilings restored from the XIX century and perfectly integrated with modern interior.
Casa Kessler Barcelona has 2 double superior rooms and 2 juniors suites, 5 shared bedrooms, cozy and warm, with a chill out terrace to relax and escape the stress of the city.
Excellent location in the center of Barcelona next to Plaza Catalunya, Las Ramblas and Paseo de Gracia.
neighborhood_overview:
Located right in the center of Barcelona, Casa Kessler offers air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi and unique, modern design. It also has on the main floor a common chill out terrace and a guest kitchen.

Gaudí’s Casa Batlló and La Pedrera houses can both be reached in a 5-minute walk. Sagrada Familia is easily reached by metro or 20 minutes by foot.

Eixample is a great choice for travellers interested in architecture, food and shopping.

This is our guests' favourite part of Barcelona, according to independent reviews.

This property also has one of the best-rated locations in Barcelona! Guests are happier about it compared to other properties in the area.
host_about:
Located 10 minutes’ walk from Plaza Catalunya, Casa Kessler Barcelona offers air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi and unique, modern design. It has a chill out terrace and a guest kitchen with 2 microwave-grill, toaster, kettle,coffee maker and fridge.

Elegant rooms feature ornate lamps, mirrors, and original fabrics. Dorm rooms have shared bathrooms, and there are private rooms and studios with a private bathroom.

Passeig de Gracia is a 5-minute walk away and offers many designer shops. A wide selection of restaurants and bars can be found in the streets surround Casa Kessler. The property offers a free walking tour around the Gothic Quarter in Italian, Spanish and English every day.

Gaudí’s Casa Batlló and La Pedrera houses can both be reached in a 5-minute walk. Sagrada Familia is easily reached by metro.

Airport buses leave from Plaza Catalunya, while trains to Barcelona Airport stop at Passeig de Gracia Station, 700 m away.

Eixample is a great choice for travellers interested in architecture, food and culture.

This is our guests' favourite part of Barcelona, according to independent reviews.

Couples particularly like the location — they rated it 9.3 for a two-person trip.

This property is also rated for the best value in Barcelona! Guests are getting more for their money when compared to other properties in this city.

neighborhood_overview:
The Fort Pienc district, where the house is located, belongs to the famous Eixample district of Barcelona. It is one of the fashionable neighborhoods in this tourist city because of its proximity to several tourist spots such as the Sagrada Familia, the tower Glóries, the park of the Ciudadela or the Arc de Triunf.

It is also necessary to mention that it is very close to the most famous street of the city -the Diagonal of Barcelona- and to the picturesque district of Born, known for its bohemian spirit, its cultural monuments - Picasso Museum and Textile Museum- and for its dozens of bars, cafes and shops of unique and special character.

name: Sant Jaume Gotico
description: Your home in the Gothic Quarter. Welcome to the most historic neighborhood in the city.
host_about:
Somos unos apasionados de los viajes. Tanto, que ¡nos hemos convertido en profesionales! 

Estamos muy orgullosos de haber empezado alquilando apartamentos en Barcelona a viajeros nacionales e internacionales. Llevamos más de una década alquilando apartamentos a familias, grupos de amigos, parejas... y realmente siempre ha sido una experiencia muy gratificante para nosotros. Cuando viajamos con nuestros niños, o cuando podemos escaparnos un fin de semana solos, es la opción de alojamiento que más nos gusta. Tenemos independencia, comodidad, conocemos muchos anfitriones nos enriquecen con sus historias y consejos sobre la ciudad y vivimos la ciudad casi casi como un local más.

Nos gusta sentirnos a gusto cuando viajamos, por eso es lo que intentamos ofrecer siempre a nuestros huéspedes. Tenemos un pequeño equipo que nos ayuda para lograr una mejor atención y que se esfuerza por hacer de la experiencia lo mejor posible. 

Esperamos verte pronto! Y no dudes en contactarnos para lo que necesites. 

Lodging Team

neighborhood_overview:
This unique area is rich in history, architecture, culture, and cuisine. Just a short distance to the trendy Passeig de Gràcia you will find, La Pedrera, Casa Batlló, and Casa Milà along with several upscale shops and restaurants.
On summer (July and August) a few meters away there is the "Eixample beach" where relax and refresh yourself.
Also, within walking distance there is the Arc del Triomf, Parc de la Ciutadella, Plaça Catalunya, Ramblas... Even the beaches are only 15 minutes by metro.

The location is truly ideal to enjoy all of the splendors Barcelona offers.

Great shopping, excellent galleries and restaurants all around!

description: It is a spacious and elegant three-bedroom apartment with two terraces, in the Golden Square of the Eixample.
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is located in Eixample, the most iconic neighbourhood in the centre of Barcelona. You will be located in an charming area with the best of Barcelona’s modernism alongside elegant shops and boutiques. Main landmarks include Gaudi’s awe-inspiring Sagrada Familia and Plaza Catalunya, where shopaholics will find an array of commercial chains and boutiques offering all the latest trends.

You’ll have plenty of opportunities to try some typical Spanish and Catalonian gastronomy in the restaurants which populate the area. They include the revered Teoric Taverna Gastronomica, where gleaming reviews are proof of the high quality Mediterranean dishes on offer and Don Kilo Barcelona, an extremely popular restaurant serving Italian classics.

This neighbourhood is well-connected to the main city attractions and offers great public transport connections, so enjoy the area knowing that other exciting Barcelona neighbourhoods are within easy reach!

neighborhood_overview:
The Eixample district not only is the most iconic in Barcelona, it’s also the most diverse in terms of shopping, restaurants and nightlife. The gridlike layout is the symbol of the sunny and modern Barcelona we know today.

Eixample, which translates as "extension" in recognition of its status as the newer part of the city, is a large area north of Plaça de Catalunya spreading left and right of Passeig de Gràcia. The area is indeed an extension to the city that benefits greatly from its ingenious urban planning at the hands of Catalan engineer Ildefons Cerdà in the 1850s. Cerdà had a fondness for straight lines. Therefore, the whole area is set out in a grid with each block having an inner courtyard. This means that it is hard to get lost in Eixample, and moreover, easy to find places.

Nowadays Eixample is famous for being home to the majority of Barcelona's Art Nouveau masterpieces, and a high-class residential and shopping area. The Eixample is one of the mo

neighborhood_overview:
The L'Eixample neighborhood in Barcelona is one of the most emblematic and cosmopolitan in the city. It is known for its modernist architecture and unique urban design, with its famous blocks of square buildings intersecting at right angles.

The L'Eixample district is divided into two parts: the left and the right. The left side is the most commercial, with a wide variety of shops, restaurants and bars. The right part, on the other hand, is more residential and quiet.

L'Eixample is also home to the famous Paseo de Gracia avenue, home to some of Barcelona's most luxurious fashion stores and several of the city's most important modernist buildings, such as Casa Batlló and La Pedrera, designed by the famous architect Antoni Gaudi.

In general, L'Eixample is a very lively and vibrant neighborhood, full of life and activity 24 hours a day. It is a great place to live or visit if you like to be close to the city center and enjoy urban life.

neighborhood_overview:
Pronouncing its name might be tricky, but getting lost in Eixample doesn't tend to be a problem. This modern area of Barcelona was designed by Catalan civil engineer Cerda in the mid 18th century as the old town area was starting to burst at its medieval seams. Its geometric layout and broad, sunny streets are a pleasant contrast to the labyrinthine feel of the older parts of the city.

The wealthy elite of Barcelonese society were keen to make their mark on this new town, and commissioned some of the most in vogue architects of the day to design their homes. As a result, Eixample boasts the most concentrated example of Modernista architecture in Barcelona. As you are wandering around, don't look at your feet. Peek into doorways and patios and glance up at street lamps and balconies - you'll see lots of little Modernista touches that all go towards creating the atmosphere of the place.

name: BARCELONA| FUNKY LIGHTS | PRIVATE BALCONY ¤
neighborhood_overview: Located between the foothills of Montjuïc and the port, Poble Sec is one of the oldest neighborhoods in Barcelona. For a long time it was a relatively poor area and home to some of Barcelona’s most destitute residents. Today, Poble Sec is making a name for itself as an up-and-coming corner of town with a great food scene. As a multicultural and working-class neighbourhood, Poble-sec maintains a popular character and varied culture, and it is open to all those who want to go and take a look. Its main arteries are Carrer Blai, which is like a little "rambla" packed with bars and shops in equal measure, and Plaça del Sortidor, where a young Joan Manel Serrat used to play and now you can find the neighbourhood civic centre, which has been very active in recent years.
host_about:
Hi there,

My name is Enrique and I am a Barcelona Local. I have always loved traveling myself, but also sharing the beauty and wonders of Barcelona with others, so a few years ago I started renting out 2 apartments to travelers coming to the city, always meeting everyone in person so I could share my insights and hidden secrets about Barcelona :)

Now I rent out a few more apartments and it is no longer just me, but we are a small team of people managing the apartments together, but with the same focus on personal and attentive services in authentic apartments that allow for the genuine Barcelona feel for your trip! We call our little team Stay U-nique, because of this focus on a unique feeling when staying with us.

If you have any questions, want to hear about an apartment or just say hi, don´t hesitate to reach out :)

Have a great day!
Enrique

neighborhood_overview:
The Barrio de Gràcia, or as we call it here the Vila de Gràcia, is a central and safe neighborhood, very well connected, very emblematic, it is like a town within the city.
In its squares and terraces you can relax, rest, read or share with friends pleasant moments
In this neighborhood live families generation after generation and also young people.
It is surrounded by other neighbourhoods called "Zona Alta de Barcelona" (high economic level) such as the Eixample, Sarria-Sant Gervasi, etc.
In its small streets and squares you can find all kinds of shops: bakeries, butchers, grocery stores, pharmacies, restaurants (from cheap to very high level) as well as bars, cafes with terraces, boutiques, theaters, cinemas...
In the LLivertat market you will find all kinds of fresh and quality food products.
The Teatre Lliure is just two blocks away.

Hello everyone! I'm Adriana and I'm part of the Plaza Goya Rooms team with Kati, Noel and Silvina.

It is located in a modernist building in Plaza Goya. The perfect place to start the day in one of the main shopping avenues of Barcelona, near the Passeig de Gracia. The hotel was completely renovated in 2017, maintaining the unique beauty of the building's facade and adding modern and elegant interiors that offer comfort and warmth.

We have been working in the sector for 5 years with a clear objective: to offer our passengers rooms with all the comfort and cutting-edge technology at competitive prices. We guarantee quality and the friendliest treatment to make the stay unforgettable.
We currently have 4 hotels in the heart of Barcelona and we are in a continuous search for better offers and amenities.

The Plaza Goya Rooms team is young and dynamic and will welcome people who speak Spanish, English, Italian, Checo. We always offer personalized attention to all our clients from 09:00 a.m. to 00:00 a.m.

Of course, we are experts in tourism so whatever you doubt, let us know we will be happy to help you prepare your stay! We will offer you all kinds of tips and suggestions, the best places to eat, essential visits, ... all the information that may be useful! We want your stay with us to be really fantastic, our house is your home! We will wait for you!
.......................................................................................................................................................

¡Hola a todos! Soy Adriana y formo parte del equipo de Plaza Goya Rooms  junto con Katerina, Ma Noel y Silvina.

Se encuentra en un edificio modernista en Plaza Goya. El lugar perfecto para comenzar el día en una de las principales avenidas de compras de Barcelona, cerca del Passeig de Gracia. El hotel fue completamente renovado en 2017, manteniendo la belleza única de la fachada del edificio y agregando interiores modernos y elegantes que ofrecen confort y calidez.

Llevamos 5 años trabajando en el sector con un claro objetivo: ofrecer a nuestros pasajeros habitaciones con todo el confort  y la tecnología de vanguardia a precios competitivos. Garantizamos la calidad y el trato más amigable para que la estancia sea inolvidable.
Actualmente contamos con 4 hoteles en el mismo corazón de Barcelona y estamos en una continua búsqueda de mejores ofertas y comodidades.

El equipo de Plaza Goya Rooms es joven y  dinámico le recibirán personas que hablan español, inglés, italiano, checo. Siempre ofrecemos una atención personalizada a todos nuestros clientes desde las 09:00 am hasta las 00:00 am.

Por supuesto, somos expertos en turismo así que sea cuál sea tu duda coméntanosla ¡estaremos encantados de ayudarte a preparar tu estancia! Te ofreceremos todo tipo de consejos y sugerencias, los mejores lugares para comer, visitas imprescindibles, … ¡toda la información que pueda serte de utilidad! Queremos que tu estancia con nosotros sea realmente fantástica, ¡nuestra casa es tu casa! ¡Te esperamos!

neighborhood_overview: The Ofelias Hotel is located next to the Gran Vía and a 2 minute walk to the Plaza Espanya metro station and the Fira exhibition center. It is located just in front of the Las Arenas shopping center, less than 1 km from the Magic Fountain and Montjuïc Park. The property is also just 200 meters from the airport bus stop.
host_about: Our source of inspiration is Pre-Raphaelite art , an idyllic painting fueled by legends, myths, adventures, love stories and tragedies, full of sensuality and beauty. We are also driven by the search for the sensual and the beautiful. Her name, OFELIAS, we have taken from the name of Hamlet's beloved, who gave the title to one of the pictorial works of Jhon Everett Millais. This is the aesthetic and conceptual proposal that we want to share with our guests: a harmonious stay in an environment dominated by sensuality and beauty.

description: Located on the prestigious 'Rambla de Catalunya', just moments from Plaza Catalunya and Barcelona's historic heart, our 2-bedroom apartment offers an ideal retreat. Painstaking attention to detail in both furnishing and interior design ensures a peaceful and luxurious stay. From quality bedding to a spacious open kitchen, and a romantic bathtub, every element of our apartment is designed to provide a unique Barcelona experience.
neighborhood_overview: It's hard to beat the prestigious Rambla de Catalunya to discover Barcelona. Our apartment is 30 seconds walk to Plaza Catalunya (Barcelona main square) and 2 min walk to the famous Ramblas and the historical center. The Apple store is just around the block and Passeig de Gracia with all the luxury shops.

neighborhood_overview:
El Raval is the name of the neighbourhood where I live.

My place is 10-minute walk from:

-Plaza Cataluña
-Plaza España (Font de Montjuic)
-La Rambla
-Plaza Reial

it is a vibrant place filled with flavours, colours and environments from around the world. Keeping at the same time the beautiful buildings and parks that make it unique in Barcelona.

Location is very central and good to discover landmarks like Plaza Catalunya, Las Ramblas and Montjuïc.

Plaza Catalunya is 10 min on foot. It is considered the city center. It is a beautiful square with nice fountains and ornaments. Close to shopping areas like El Triangle shopping center and Paseo de Gracia promenade full of world known clothing shops.

Las Ramblas is the most famous promenade in Barcelona that goes from Plaza Catalunya to the Columbus monument by a seaport.

The area is close to museums, restaurants and monuments of the city.

description: Bright, stylish two-bedroom + one-bathroom apartment in Barcelona’s lively Gracia District and close to the city center´s main strip, trendy Passeig de Gracia Avenue. neighborhood_overview:
Squares, parks and, also, buildings with history. Gracia is the cradle of some of the most representative modernist buildings of modernist architecture in Barcelona. One of them is the Casa Vicens, the first work of Gaudí and former bourgeois residence. It is located on Carolines Street.

Of narrow streets and with few vehicles, in Gràcia one breathes a small town atmosphere. There are many squares full of terraces and good atmosphere that characterize the neighborhood.

There are plenty of theaters, cinemas, cultural centers and neighborhood stores where creativity is wasted.
host_about:
I live in Barcelona, a city that has captivated me from the start for its culture, history and beauty. I work as a full-time host for Aspasios and couldn’t think of a better job: at Aspasios we love to make our guests feel at home. A big part of our job is listening carefully to our visitors: we learn so much from them every day. We enjoy meeting each and every person who comes to stay with us, and want them to come back because of us. We pride ourselves on being professional and friendly at the same time. At Aspasios, we are passionate about hospitality.

My colleagues Jesus, Vanessa, Yenai, Paola and I are always on hand to help you make the most of your trip to Barcelona. We know this lovely city inside out, so can recommend plenty of restaurants, bars and activities that you might not find in the guide books!

description: Book one (or more) beds in this shared 8-bed dormitory, featuring four bunk beds and a private bathroom. Each bunk is equipped with a personal light, shelf, and under-bed locker. The room is air-conditioned, ensuring a comfortable stay, with pillows, duvets, and linens provided. Towels are available for hire at reception. This dorm is exclusively for guests aged 18 and over, offering a social and budget-friendly experience.
neighborhood_overview:
You'll find Generator Barcelona in the buzzing district of Gràcia. The hostel’s just a short walk from Gaudi's iconic Casa Batlló apartments. The interiors showcase a mix of styles and include an oversized wooden birdcage, a winding staircase and a mezzanine chill-out lounge.

Feast on local delicacies in our bar and lounge, which is decked out in ornate Hungarian concrete floor tiles and earthy raw metals and woods. For a sociable set-up, our Barcelona hostel offers a range of shared rooms to suit your individual needs. If you’d prefer more privacy (and a little more luxury), we also have terrace rooms and a penthouse apartment – complete with mind-blowing panoramic views of one of Europe’s best-looking cities. However you want to experience this cosmopolitan capital, Generator Barcelona can help.
host_about:
In response to Coronavirus (COVID-19), additional safety and sanitation measures are currently in effect at this property, including social distancing and in-house disinfection.

Welcome to Generator Barcelona! If you're looking for an acommodation that can promise the best view of Barcelona, look no further. The 8th floor offers a stunning view of the Sagrada Familia and some rooms have their own spacious terraces. The showers here are amazing, and the food is cheap but surprisingly delicious. The famous Barceloneta Beach is a 15 minute metro ride away, and the hostel is perched just a short walk from the city's most buzzing bars and restaurants. The staff here are also a highlight, most of them speak more than one language and are always willing to go the extra mile if you find yourself in a moment of need.

name: Upscale city center II w/ pool, gym, sauna, WiFi
neighborhood_overview:
Pronouncing its name might be tricky, but getting lost in Eixample doesn't tend to be a problem. This modern area of Barcelona was designed by Catalan civil engineer Cerda in the mid 18th century as the old town area was starting to burst at its medieval seams. Its geometric layout and broad, sunny streets are a pleasant contrast to the labyrinthine feel of the older parts of the city.

The wealthy elite of Barcelonese society were keen to make their mark on this new town, and commissioned some of the most in vogue architects of the day to design their homes. As a result, Eixample boasts the most concentrated example of Modernista architecture in Barcelona. As you are wandering around, don't look at your feet. Peek into doorways and patios and glance up at street lamps and balconies - you'll see lots of little Modernista touches that all go towards creating the atmosphere of the place.
host_about:
At Unique, we know our guests have worked close to a month for every day they get to spend on holidays. Therefore, it is our goal to make every single vacation day spent at our properties an enjoyable and memorable one. 

With the highest quality hand picked apartments in Barcelona, 8 languages spoken, agents on call and email 24/7, commitment to provide the best customer attention in town, we are at your service!

Hello, 

KeyInnApartments we are a vacation apartment and short-term rental agency. 

After ten years in the Hospitality and Tourism business, we founded KeyInnApartments in order to offer you the best possible conditions for your stay.

We have carefully selected properties, completely furnished and equipped so that you enjoy all the necessary comforts during your stay.

We offer a diverse range of apartments including studios for couples, 2 and 3 bedroom apartments for families, and apartments with up to 6 bedrooms for groups of friends. 

We can also house larger groups in multiple apartments located in the same building or neighborhood.

We strive to offer consistently high quality in our apartments. 

The availability, engagement, and reliability of our team distinguish us from the rest.


Contact us for your next escape.


The KeyInn Apartments team.

description: The apartment located in the center of  Barcelona, is a great accommodation option for those looking to enjoy all the plans, culture and activities that the city hosts. neighborhood_overview:
805/5000
This house is located in the center near Sagrada Familia, the area combines architecture and beauty. Within a few steps, guests can find two architectural gems of Barcelona, the Sant Pau Hospital, the Lluís Domènechi Montaner and the Sagrada Familia, the symbol of Antonio Gaudí's art. We are located in a modernist neighborhood, suitable for all ages and tastes, and 10 minutes from many of the city's tourist attractions. Gaudí Avenue is a vibrant half-walk promenade. Although the street runs through it, all elements of the artery have the characteristics of a rambla: limited vehicle traffic, side and side reserves, terraces, and many shops that satisfy shoppers.附近。
The house is located in the heart of the Sagrada Familia neighborhood, an area that combines architecture and beauty with functionality. A few steps away, the guest will find two of the architectural gems of Barcelona, the Hospital Sant Pau, by Lluís Domènech i Montaner, and the Cathedral of the Sagrada Fa
host_about: Soy una fotógrafa. Hablo español, chino y english. encantado de conocerte!!

description: This elegant apartment is full of light, with floor-to-ceiling windows that allow sunlight to stream in. This space is modern and sleek, with jade and teal tones throughout the living room, the three cosy, charming bedrooms and the stunning hallway, full of plants. The tile work throughout gives this home a charming, old-world feel. From the balcony, there is a wonderful view of the tree-lined streets. Located in the centre this apartment will be ideal for discovering Barcelona.
neighborhood_overview: A modernist treasure trove full of elaborate and often fantastical buildings, elegant landscapes and upmarket fashion - there’s really something magical about Eixample.  The area sits on the right hand side of Passeig de Gràcia, the main boulevard that separates the city.  Its gridded layout keeps things nice and simple for walking around - most tourists flock to Gaudi’s emblematic Sagrada Familia church, but Eixample itself is a peaceful, residential neighbourhood that offers many an opportunity for a quite respite.  You could easily spend the day just popping in-and-out of the various artist galleries, small boutiques and neighbourhood cafes scattered about, that is if you can tear yourself away from the high-end shops that line the avenues.  To top it all off, Eixample is only two metro stops away from Placa Catalunya at the city centre.
host_about: Sweett (formerly Sweet Inn) invites you to enjoy comfort, convenience, and local charm in our thoughtfully designed apartments. With 10+ years of hosting experience, we ensure a home-like stay with cozy bedding, fast WiFi, and a Nespresso machine. Our 24/7 team assists with early check-ins, transfers, housekeeping, and local tips. Enjoy welcome treats, personalized recommendations, and our smart app. Sweett is your perfect base for urban escapes.

neighborhood_overview:
Gràcia was an independent town until the late 19th century. The area is popular with artists and a generally bohemian crowd, it also has a high ethnic population and the highest concentration of foreign restaurants in Barcelona.

Plaça de Sol is the most renowned area of the neighbourhood full with terraces and cafes. Shopping is also good in Gràcia, where arty boutiques stand next to traditional Spanish stores.

We are people whom like people. Our mission is no other than making your stay at Barcelona unforgettable. Do not hesitate to ask for anything as we are at your full disposal.

Experience Barcelona With Us & Learn More Below!
neighborhood_overview: Poble Nou is an upcoming business area which is close to the beach. To reach the city center it will take you a bit of time ( aprox 20 minutes) but staying here will give you the opportunity to enjoy a calm and quiet neighbourhood and live like the locals! The Palo Market is right in front of the building which offers you a great second hand market on Sundays with foodtrucks and music.
host_about:
Hi there,

My name is Enrique and I am a Barcelona Local. I have always loved traveling myself, but also sharing the beauty and wonders of Barcelona with others, so a few years ago I started renting out 2 apartments to travelers coming to the city, always meeting everyone in person so I could share my insights and hidden secrets about Barcelona :)

Now I rent out a few more apartments and it is no longer just me, but we are a small team of people managing the apartments together, but with the same focus on personal and attentive services in authentic apartments that allow for the genuine Barcelona feel for your trip! We call our little team Stay U-nique, because of this focus on a unique feeling when staying with us.

If you have any questions, want to hear about an apartment or just say hi, don´t hesitate to reach out :)

Have a great day!
Enrique

name: Lovely double bedroom close to the beach
neighborhood_overview:
Poblenou Neighborhood is one of the most overlooked areas in Barcelona. Poblenou is a former industrial district that has experienced an intense transformation. The development of new areas and renovation of old factories and warehouses into new office buildings, lofts and art galleries, has turned it into an extremely dynamic place.
Poblenou offers a fusion of old and new, We love the close proximity to some of Barcelona's best beaches, the wide open spaces, green parks, lack of tourists, and being able to lead a very 'tranquilo' (chilled out) lifestyle while still being just a stone's throw to the city centre.

Nice and bright apartment, FOR FAMILIES WITH CHILDREN, in the center of Barcelona.
What makes it special: a beautiful view of Ciutadella Park from the spacious living room!
The building has a large shared terrace where you can relax and disconnect after your city tours, with magnificent views of the Ciutadella Park and Barcelona.
neighborhood_overview: This apartment is located in one of the best areas to visit and live in Barcelona. It is right in front of the Ciutadella park and has magnificent views of the park from the shared terrace. The Parc de la Ciutadella is the best, largest and most central park in Barcelona, ​​the lung of Barcelona. It is ideal for walking, playing with children, running or relaxing under their trees. Next to the apartment is also the Born district which has numerous restaurants of all kinds, shops of local designers, Picasso museum, cultural center of Born, etc. It is a very nice neighborhood. A little further there is the Gothic quarter of Barcelona, ​​the historic center of Barcelona, ​​the noble neighborhood where the history of the city is breathed. In addition, the beaches of Barcelona are only 10 minutes walking from the apartment. The neighborhood has many shops, restaurants, bars and services to have a pleasant stay. There are two metro stops near the apartment, the stops on lines 1 (Arc de Triom
host_about:
The Family Host es nuestro sueño hecho realidad en 2019, en un edificio en el corazón de Barcelona frente la naturaleza y el mar. Recibir familias de todo el mundo , enseñarles nuestra Barcelona  y ayudarlas a sentirse como en casa,  con secretos, recomendaciones y servicios personalizados, rutas guiadas pensadas para niños y adolescentes, sin olvidar talleres y catas de vinos y tapas para los padres ;)

 La vida nos ha dado la oportunidad de viajar por el mundo en familia y encontrar anfitriones maravillosos, ahora es el momento de devolver todo ese afecto y amabilidad a nuestros huéspedes. Nos gusta mostrar nuestra ciudad y ayudar en todo lo que podamos. ¡ anfitriones por naturaleza! 
Xavi & Luna.

neighborhood_overview:
HAPPY NEIGHBOURHOOD OF OUR "ACOMODIS" APARTMENT
Paral.lel and Poble Sec are barrios included in the district called Montjuïc. Paral.lel is an avenue that cuts down from picturesque Plaça Espanya right down to the World Trade Centre at the tip of the port. Poble Sec is an area spreading out from the middle of Paral.lel.

The areas are safe and primarily residential but there is much entertainment to be had as well. This includes popular bars, theatre and even a club. However, whilst Paral.lel is a busy thoroughfare during the day, the areas are quiet and just a 10-20 minute walk to the centre of the city and Las Ramblas. A good choice if you want to be central but away from the crowds of tourists that populate more central areas.

name: New apartment with spacious terrace, Verdi, Gracia
description:
Cozy two-bedrooms and one-bathroom apartment with modern design and a spacious private terrace, this building is located in bohemian Gracia District and just ten minutes walking from famous Diagonal Avenue.
This apartment that can host up to five guests is also fully equipped. Ideal for families or groups of friends who are willing to visit Barcelona emblematic tourist attractions or exploring the surroundings of this lively neighborhood with plenty of local restaurants, bars and unique shops.
neighborhood_overview:
Explore vivid Gracia District, walk around its narrow streets with few vehicles and feel the small town atmosphere of one of the cultural and shopping favourite areas for the locals.
The architecture of the neigbourhood is stunning, with some real modernist gems to explore, such as Casa Vicens, the first work of Gaudí and former bourgeois residence.
Discover original designer stores and high street brands next to all sorts of great restaurants and bars. There are many squares full of terraces and a good atmosphere perfect to relax after a day of sightseeing.
The area boasts great transport links and you’ll be able to get to all the ends of the city in a few minutes by underground, bus and taxi.
host_about:
I live in Barcelona, a city that has captivated me from the start for its culture, history and beauty. I work as a full-time host for Aspasios and couldn’t think of a better job: at Aspasios we love to make our guests feel at home. A big part of our job is listening carefully to our visitors: we learn so much from them every day. We enjoy meeting each and every person who comes to stay with us, and want them to come back because of us. We pride ourselves on being professional and friendly at the same time. At Aspasios, we are passionate about hospitality.

My colleagues Jesus, Vanessa, Yenai, Paola and I are always on hand to help you make the most of your trip to Barcelona. We know this lovely city inside out, so can recommend plenty of restaurants, bars and activities that you might not find in the guide books!

name: Casa Cosi - Putxet 4
description: Casa Cosi - Putxet 4 is a charming apartment of 100m2 including 30m2 of terrace. The huge terrace will surprise you! Very well furnished and decorated, you can enjoy it practically all year round thanks to the good weather of Barcelona. Completely renovated and equipped, this apartment maintains its charm with its ancient tiles and famous Catalan vaults. You will love your authentic character and the maximum comfort you can offer.
neighborhood_overview: Casa Cosi Putxet is located in the neighborhood of Sant Gervasi. Quieter than the busy center and very appreciated by the locals, you will love this area! Close to the alleys and squares of the charming Gracia neighborhood, it’s also really well connected to the rest of the city: it’s a 5 minutes’ walk from 2 metro stations (Padua and Sant Gervasi) so you can travel around the city easily. Moreover, there are also many bus stops nearby. It’s 10min by metro to las Ramblas and Plaça Catalunya; Avenida Diagonal is at 15min walking and Passeig de Gracia at 20min walking.
host_about:
Choisis principalement pour leur emplacement et leur luminosité, nos appartements Casa Cosi ont minutieusement été rénovés afin de préserver leur caractère tout en leur apportant un maximum de confort : double vitrage, climatisation et chauffage central, salle de bain modernes, cuisines fonctionnelles, meubles et literie de qualité, équipements complets : TV, électroménager, vaisselle, linge de maison et bien sur une connexion internet avec wifi....

Nous avons choisi des emplacements centraux pour que touristes ou en voyage professionnel, vous puissiez profiter d'un quartier vivant qui vous ouvre les portes de la ville mais aussi bénéficier d'une grande offre de transports.

À Barcelone, notre quartier de prédilection est l’Eixample. Un quartier central, animé proche des Ramblas, du Passeo de Gracia, de la Plaça de Catalanuya et plaça Universitat. Un quartier à l'architecture moderniste dans lequel les commerces, les restaurants et bars à tapas sont nombreux. Un quartier à partir duquel on se promène dans la ville.  

Notre structure de taille humaine nous permet d’être proche de vos attentes. Nous vous accueillons à votre arrivée pour vous présenter le lieu et le quartier, et restons joignables tout au long de votre séjour pour vous orienter et répondre à vos éventuelles demandes. N'hésitez pas à nous contacter.

Welcome to Casa Cosi !

This beautiful penthouse will be a plus in your Barcelona experience. With 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms, an enormous terrace with lots of light and great views you will have the best time here. The Eixample neighborhood is full of bars and restaurants, and the flat is in front of a subway station.

Experience Barcelona With Us & Learn More Below!
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is located in Eixample, the most iconic neighborhood in the center of Barcelona. You will be located in a charming area with the best of Barcelona’s modernism alongside elegant shops and boutiques. Main landmarks include Gaudi’s awe-inspiring Sagrada Familia and Plaza Catalunya, where shopaholics will find an array of commercial chains and boutiques offering all the latest trends.

You’ll have plenty of opportunities to try some typical Spanish and Catalonian gastronomy in the restaurants which populate the area. They include the revered Teoric Taverna Gastronomica, where gleaming reviews are proof of the high-quality Mediterranean dishes on offer and Don Kilo Barcelona, an extremely popular restaurant serving Italian classics.

This neighborhood is well-connected to the main city attractions and offers great public transport connections, so enjoy the area knowing that other exciting Barcelona neighborhoods are within easy reach!

neighborhood_overview:
HAPPY NEIGHBOURHOOD OF OUR "ACOMODIS" APARTMENT
Paral.lel and Poble Sec are barrios included in the district called Montjuïc. Paral.lel is an avenue that cuts down from picturesque Plaça Espanya right down to the World Trade Centre at the tip of the port. Poble Sec is an area spreading out from the middle of Paral.lel.

The areas are safe and primarily residential but there is much entertainment to be had as well. This includes popular bars, theatre and even a club. However, whilst Paral.lel is a busy thoroughfare during the day, the areas are quiet and just a 10-20 minute walk to the centre of the city and Las Ramblas. A good choice if you want to be central but away from the crowds of tourists that populate more central areas.

Montjuïc and Plaça Espanya are also very close by. The event halls and the Palau de Congressos near Plaça espanya also make the Poble Sec area perfect for those in Barcelona on business. Although both Plaça Espanya and Montjuïc have a

Sus calles antiguas, su casco histórico, sumado a la excelente comunicación a través del Bus o el Metro.
Con el metro de badal a solo 2/3 minutos, para ir al aeropuerto o al centro en 5 minutos. Es muy facil!!
Barrio de buena gente
Con supermercados enormes, grandes restaurantes, cafeterías muy buenas para desayunar o comer por €2 o €3, cine, parking.
Muy bien comunicado por metro y por bus, con sus estaciones muy cerca del piso a unos 2 o 3 minutos!
Lavanderías muy buenas y economicas a solo 5 minutos.
La Rambla de Badal está a 5 minutos y tiene un buen ambiente para cenar por la noche y dar un paseo en un ambiente de seguridad.
Por esto el Barrio de Sants es uno de los mejores barrios de Barcelona para vivir en una comunidad muy tranquila y familiar.

description:
Delightful apartment located in an original building in the emblematic Gothic neighbourhood of cosmopolitan Barcelona, next to the Merced Basilica and Ample street. The location couldn’t be better given its proximity to the main sights of the area: Ramblas, Plaza Real, Columbus square, the Boquería market and the port. Walkable distance to all the tourist attractions and the Barceloneta beach.

Supplies not included (Electricity, Water).We request 250€/month.
neighborhood_overview:
Barrio Gotico, spanish for ‘Gothic Quarter,’ is one of the oldest and most beautiful districts in Barcelona. It is a labyrinth of small streets full of little bars, restaurants and shops. The neighborhood is part of the Ciutat Vella, Catalan for ‘the old city,’ and is situated right in the city center: it stretches from the famous Rambla to Via Laietana.
It is a charming district that has narrow medieval alleys filled with trendy bars, pubs and Catalan restaurants. In the Museu d'Història de Barcelona, remains of the Roman city are exhibited. Artisans sell leather and precious stones products in the vicinity of the Barcelona Cathedral and flower and food stalls fill the busy Rambla. In Plaza del Pi, named after the adjoining Gothic church, an art market is installed every weekend.

Silvia&Luis

name: Lugaris Beach Apartamento Business Superior
neighborhood_overview:
Poblenou: the bohemian neighborhood of Barcelona, where cool is the real thing, simplicity is a maximum.

Located a few minutes (5 metro stops on the yellow line) from the center of Barcelona, staying in Poble Nou is a great option, if you visit Barcelona.
Near the new business district 22 @ and minutes from the Mediterranean Sea, the Poble Nou district offers you the chance to enjoy the beach and the park which separates it from the city, to stroll through the charming Rambla with many bars and restaurants, to delight the cuisine and neighborhood atmosphere. A place to contemplate the splendid appearance of old restored factories and where to discover beautiful places like the Plaza Prim.
host_about:
En Lugaris, tenemos un objetivo muy claro: que te sientas como en casa desde el primer momento, por muy alejado/a que estés de tu lugar de origen. Para ello, disponemos de los mejores apartamentos cerca de la playa de Barcelona, ubicados en el histórico barrio industrial de Poblenou, rodeados de zonas verdes y próximos al Mediterráneo, este complejo residencial te brinda pisos de lujo perfectos para grupos de 2 a 6 personas, completamente amueblados y equipados con todo lo que necesitarás durante tu estancia en Barcelona. Además, en ellos también encontrarás conexión WiFi gratuita y una amplia selección de cadenas de televisión vía satélite.

Si te apetece darte un baño en la piscina sin pisar la calle, o disfrutar de unas hipnóticas vistas sobre el mar, te invitamos a descubrir los apartamentos Lugaris Beach, situados a tan sólo 200 m de las playas de Bogatell y la Mar Bella y junto a un frondoso pinar.

name: CHEERFUL APARTMENT WITH TERRACE IN CITY CENTER
neighborhood_overview:
The Gothic Quarter is one of the oldest and most emblematic neighborhoods in the city of Barcelona, located in the heart of the historic center of the city. This neighborhood is characterized by its narrow medieval streets, historical buildings, churches, squares and museums.

The Gothic Quarter is a labyrinth of narrow cobbled streets that retain the charm of medieval times. The neighborhood is bounded by Via Laietana, Plaza Cataluña, Paseo de Colón and Ronda de Sant Pere.

Among the main attractions of the Gothic Quarter are the Barcelona Cathedral, which is one of the most important symbols of the city and has a Gothic cloister and a neo-Gothic façade. There is also the Basilica of Santa María del Pi, the Palau de la Generalitat, Plaza Sant Jaume, the Portal del Ángel, Plaza del Rey and the Picasso Museum, which houses an important collection of works by the genius from Malaga.

The Gothic Quarter is a perfect place to enjoy the historical architecture,

Castellano
El emblemático Barrio de Sants es uno de los lugares más visitados por el turismo mundial. Es un barrio seguro!
Sus calles antiguas, su casco histórico, sumado a la excelente comunicación a través del Bus o el Metro.
Con el metro de badal a solo 2/3 minutos, para ir al aeropuerto o al centro en 5 minutos. Es muy facil!!
Barrio de buena gente
Con supermercados enormes, grandes restaurantes, cafeterías muy buenas para desayunar o comer por €2 o €3, cine, parking.

Lavanderías muy buenas y economicas a solo 5 minutos.
La Rambla de Badal está a 5 minutos y tiene un buen ambiente para cenar por la noche y dar un paseo en un ambiente de seguridad.
Por esto el Barrio de Sants es uno de los mejores barrios de Barcelona para vivir en una comunidad muy tranquila y familiar.

name: Modern 2-bedroom apartment in Gracia
neighborhood_overview:
A perfect location for those who enjoy the more local Barcelona. The Gracia neighborhood is known for its small town character, which, incidentally, until 1897 was separated from Barcelona.

Gracia breathes another rhythm, has its own soul and special character. In it you can enjoy the contrast of the traditional and the latest trends in Barcelona. Ancient craft shops co-exist with the more advanced proposals.

Around the building you can find several supermarkets, bakeries, pubs, bars and restaurants. No need to travel far, 5 minutes by walk you will find everything you need. Less than 15 minutes away you can access the Parc Güell, an incredible legacy of Antoni Gaudí, which is part of the rich heritage of Barcelona.

neighborhood_overview: Eixample is Catalan for 'extension', meaning an extension of the old Barcelona city, and it is one of the most popular districts in the Catalan capital. Eixample was designed by Catalan-born architect, Ildefons Cerdà, who took traffic and sunlight (amongst many other things) into consideration when drawing up the plans of the new area. Eixample is now characterised by its octagonal blocks and its grid-like pattern, with wide streets and both commercial and residential areas. It is split into two parts, Eixample Esquerra (Left, or in Spanish, Izquierdo) and Eixample Dret (Right, or in Spanish, Derecho), and is home to one of the most famous streets in Barcelona, Passeig de Gràcia, known for its high fashion stores and trendy restaurants. The street is intersected by the long Avinguda Diagonal, which runs through the entire city. Eixample Derecho is home to many gems of 'Modernisme' architecture, including the unique Casa Milà (La Pedrera), the colourful Casa Batlló and the towering Sagr

host_about:
Hi everyone! We are AB Apartment Barcelona, a local agency that offers accommodation options for those that want to visit our wonderful city. Let us tell you a bit more about us :)

We have been managing apartments since 2007 when David and Dani, founders and twin brothers, decided to rent their holiday apartment, personally welcoming every guest and sharing with them their recommendations and advice about Barcelona.  

Today, we have many more apartments to rent in the city, whilst maintaining the essence of our beginnings. Our team is formed by local people and others from all round the world, that will help you with any doubts you may have, either before, during, or after your stay. 

Barcelona is our home, so we will be able to advise you on the best places to visit, from sights and attractions, to local bars and restaurants. You can also consult more expert advice on our Blog, awarded as one of the best tourism blogs in Barcelona.

By renting your apartment in Barcelona through us, you’ll be in safe hands :) We are looking forward to meeting you soon!

DURING YOUR STAY

We will be happy to help you with everything you need to make your stay an unforgettable experience! In addition, you will have access to our customer area, from which you can check-in online, report any problem if necessary, as well as book apartment services, activities, transfers and access local guides about Barcelona. We also have an office open 365 days a year and we have 24-hour telephone assistance for any emergency.

However, if you plan on being out bright and early to discover the city and want a quiet and stylish space where you can chill out in the evenings, then this is a great opportunity at a reduced rate.
neighborhood_overview: Our Universitat Rooms are situated just by the popular and vibrant areas of Eixample, Gothic, Raval and Ramblas. Turn left from the building and you will find yourself at Plaça Catalunya, a central point in the city and excellent for transportation.  Just a minute's walk west from our location is Passeig de Gracia, the central avenue of the Eixample district. Fitting with the grandeur of the buildings and the majestic fountain in the middle, this street hosts some of the most exclusive shops in the city such as Chanel, Carolina Herrera, Loewe, beautifully juxtaposed amongst some of Gaudi’s architectural gems.  Turning right from your front door, you’ll find the lively Placa Universitat with the University of Barcelona, designed by the architect Elies Rogent in a style based on Catalan Romanesque. 13 Min Metro to Plaça Catalunya

☆Vila de Gracia - Great location

This lovely 3-bedroom apartment with a charming character has a lot of natural light which makes all the rooms very bright.

Experience Barcelona With Us & Learn More Below!
neighborhood_overview:
Gracia might just be the most charming neighborhood in Barcelona. With an incomparable local charm, it feels like a small city tucked away inside the metropolis.
The green spaces and public transportation are a bonus, making it easy to get outside.

The neighborhood is a mix between a young, alternative and bohemian scene and older Catalan residents who have lived there for generations. With quiet, charming plazas and tons of local shops, restaurants, and cozy cafés, Gracia is one of the very best places to stay in Barcelona.

"La Sagrada Família" is a neighborhood surrounding the Barcelona’s most famous basilica with the same name, the stunning Sagrada Família.
Sagrada Familia area is one of the best locations for a stay in Barcelona; it’s popular both among tourists and locals, as it's vibrant with local lifestyle, as well as many restaurants, bars, cafes. It is very well connected with the rest of the city with two metro lines and several buses.

name: Sonder Le Palacete | King Room w/ Terrace
description: Enjoy a taste of royalty at Le Palacete — a 20th-century sandstone mansion with wrought-iron gates and balustraded windows. Inside, there's a comfortable courtyard for unwinding. Ready to venture out? Catch stunning city views from La Sagrada Familia. Get lost in the gorgeous mosaic landscape of Park Güell. Or laze around on a sunny terraza at Plaça de la Vila de Gràcia. Get the best of Barcelona at Le Palacete.
neighborhood_overview: Crowned by one of Barcelona's most beloved landmarks, Antonio Gaudí's mosaic garden dreamscape, Park Güell, overlooks the Gràcia neighborhood from its northern hillside. A separate town from Barcelona until 1897, today’s picturesque Gràcia has maintained its provincial charm, filled exclusively with local and independent retailers and restaurants. Allow yourself to while away the afternoon hours on the sunny terrazas of authentic Catalan bistros and wine bars found at every plaça. Meander along gorgeous tree-lined boulevards, through charming lanes of colorful buildings, and stumble upon a myriad of indie boutiques, galleries, arthouse theaters, and more hidden Gaudí gems, like Casa Vicens. Over the summer, explore the offerings of the Festa Major de Gracia for street eats, eclectic art, and an unmissable atmosphere.
host_about: Rooms, suites, and apartments in over 40 cities around the world. Every Sonder features designer details, keyless entry, and fast free WiFi. Experience a better way to stay today.

name: STYLISH LOFT/Near the Beach/FastWifi/AC/SMARTTV
neighborhood_overview:
Barcelona has a plethora of cool neighbourhoods, but in recent years, there’s one barrio that just hasn’t stopped changing and growing. Poblenou lies at the centre of the Barcelona design movement, and attracts everyone from hipsters to start-ups with its trendy markets, concept stores and innovative festivals.

Poblenou is located to the east of the city centre, between the area of Glories and the stunning beach. It used to be a very traditional Catalan neighbourhood, and the central and lower parts of the barrio still are. This area is dotted with colourful Modernista architecture, and even has its own ‘rambla’ (esplanade). The north and surrounding areas, however, are very different, filled with big old warehouses and modern tech hubs. It’s here where hipsters, designers and start-ups have moved in. This area has become known as @22, a place now occupied by design schools, galleries, craft beer breweries, and new-age digital companies looking to take over the world.
host_about:
We are Andrea and Chris, we met in the beautiful city of Brisbane in Australia, and our home countries are Colombia and Germany. We lived in Brisbane until moving to the multicultural Grand Duchy of Luxembourg, where we spent many beautiful years. Recently we've relocated to Munich, close to the Alps and home of some of the worlds' best beers! 

As you may guess, we love travelling, discovering new cultures, and getting in touch with the locals. 

We have fallen in love with Barcelona its lifestyle, people and of course the sunny weather! Luckily, we discovered this modern loft in Poblenou, which is near the beach, a short walk to small shops, a local market hall, and many boutique cafes.  
Every now and then, we spend some time here. 
When we aren't in Barcelona, we would be pleased to share our beautiful place with you. We have prepared and taken care of every detail for the most memorable getaway experience.

Our co-hosts in Barcelona,  Juan Carlos & Nina, will ensure you are well taken care of during your stay, as they do for us, from book-in to check-out.

Thanks for checking out our place and enjoy sunny Barcelona.

Cheers!
Andrea & Chris.

La Pedrera and Casa Batlló, built by the famous Gaudi, are located here as well. And the most prestigious shopping boutiques in the world on Passeig de Gràcia.

host_about:
I'm Oscar, a 34 years old digital nomad from Barcelona.

I've lived in Ibiza for the last 9 years and now I'm between my two favorites places, Barcelona and Ibiza.

I'm from Couchsurfing generation, I've been an nocarz/Couchsurfing host in Ibiza and Barcelona and a guest around the world many times. I love the philosophy to share your home and meet new friends from other countries and cultures around the world.

For me the best way to travel is living day by day with local people and explore the places improvising, so I try to get this experience for my guests whenever as I can.

I'm passionate about technology, crypto world, trading, investments, startups and all relationated with entrepreneurship and disruptive businesses.

Also I love underground electronic music, improvised trips and meet interesting new people and any new place.

So if you are an artist, entrepreneur, digital nomad, electronic music lover or wanderlust spirit... sure we'll get along ;)

You can find me on IG: @mr.oskaar

neighborhood_overview:
Welcome to the vibrant neighborhood of Rambla Catalunya in Barcelona!

Located in the heart of the city, this historic and lively neighborhood is the perfect place to experience the essence of Barcelona. With its wide avenues, impressive architecture, and a wide variety of shops, restaurants, and activities, Rambla Catalunya offers something for everyone.

Stroll through the cobblestone streets and discover fashion boutiques, designer shops, and art galleries that reflect the city's unique style. Enjoy delicious cuisine at one of the many restaurants offering local and international flavors that fill the neighborhood, or simply relax on a terrace overlooking the bustling urban life.

Explore nearby attractions such as Antoni Gaudí's Casa Batlló and Casa Milà (La Pedrera), or immerse yourself in the history and culture of the city at the Barcelona Museum of Contemporary Art (MACBA) and the Picasso Museum.

neighborhood_overview:
Welcome to Les Corts, an enchanting district in the heart of Barcelona that offers a perfect blend of tradition, modernity, and a vibrant local atmosphere. From historic landmarks to bustling markets and serene parks, Les Corts beckons you to explore its treasures and experience the true essence of this captivating city.

Historical Gems:
Step back in time as you wander through the historic streets of Les Corts. Marvel at architectural wonders like the stunning Monastery of Pedralbes, a centuries-old masterpiece that whispers tales of the past. Immerse yourself in the rich heritage that's seamlessly intertwined with the contemporary urban landscape.

Shopping Delight:
Shopaholics, rejoice! Les Corts boasts an array of shopping options that cater to every taste. Whether you're seeking high-end fashion boutiques or local artisanal markets, you'll find your retail haven here. Don't miss the opportunity to explore L'Illa Diagonal, a stylish shopping center tha

neighborhood_overview:
'Provençals del Poblenou' is one of the ten neighborhoods of the Barcelona district of 'Sant Martí'. It is located near Avenida Diagonal and Gran Via de las Cortes Catalanas . There are two different units in the neighborhood: on the one hand the part of Gran Vía de las Cortes Catalanas and the area that extends to the Diagonal. There are research spaces, natural spaces, beaches, museums, leisure and leisure time, cultural heritage, cultural heritage, gyms, gyms, and shops and shops.

For public transportation:
Tram lines pass through the neighborhood, namely two, the T4 and T5 of the Trambesòs. There are up to 5 stops in the neighborhood plus two of the next.

Tram stops within the neighborhood:

• T4: Pedro IV
• T4: Fluvià
• T5 and T6: Can Jaumandreu
• T5 and T6: Espronceda
• T5 and T6: San Martín de Provenzales

Subway stops close to the neighborhood:
• L1: Glorias.
• L4: Besòs.

host_about: Soy comunicativa, con sensibilidad por las humanidades, así como las artes en general.  Aprovecho cualquier momento para estar junto a mis familiares y amigos. Una madre trabajadora, deportista y creativa.

name: Loft cerca plaza francesc macia
neighborhood_overview:
One of the most characteristic images of Barcelona is undoubtedly the Eixample, considered the most central and dynamic neighborhood of the city.
Modern Barcelona was born in L’Eixample, conceived by the engineer and urban planner to whom he owes his magical and unique drawing: Ildefons Cerdà.

Just 7 minutes walk from the Hospital Clínic de Barcelona, it becomes a strategic point.

In addition, L'Eixample groups the most monuments and places of interest.
From the apartments , just 20 minutes by public transport, we find the main tourist attractions of the city of Barcelona: Passeig de Gràcia, Casa Batlló, La Pedrera,Plaça Catalunya, Gothic Quarter...

name: Sonder DO Plaça Reial | Queen Room
description: Let the adventures begin at DO Plaça Reial. This restored 19th-century façade features shuttered windows, Juliet balconies, and neoclassical archways. Bar Tomate BCN serves delicious tapas downstairs on the patio. And breakfast is available every morning. The rooftop pool is a perfect spot to cool off. Or you can unwind with a session in the sauna. Each space features cable television and a minimalist design with warm wooden furnishings. See the best of Barcelona at DO Plaça Reial.
neighborhood_overview: As the historic heart of Barcelona, the lively beat of the beautiful Gothic Quarter pulses through the city. Also known as the Barri Gòtic, the neighborhood is an intriguing labyrinth that layers the bustling business of modern life amidst celebrated landmarks and upon centuries-old architecture. The spectacular gothic Cathedral of Barcelona overlooks thriving boutiques and cafés along stone-paved streets that are ripe for exploration and afternoon ambling.  Meandering alleyways and arched passages open to tranquil sunlit plaças and to the teeming avenues of La Rambla and Via Leitana which flank the neighborhood. Intricate wrought-iron street lamps illuminate the quarter as it transforms into its evening splendor. Bars and restaurants burst into activity on flourishing squares like Plaça Reial, while the nightlife crowd spills in and out of the secluded spots of narrower streets.
host_about: Rooms, suites, and apartments in over 40 cities around the world. Every Sonder features designer details, keyless entry, and fast free WiFi. Experience a better way to stay today.

host_about:
Soy extrovertido, alegre y amigo de mis amigos... Me encanta Barcelona, soy de aquí, he crecido, reído y llorado en esta magnífica e inacabable ciudad.
Ahora me gustaría ser tu anfitrión para enseñártela y compartir sus secretos.
Barcelona es única e incomparable, ven a conocerla... y te la enseñaré con mucho gusto!

name: Sonder Casa Luz | Queen Room
description: Welcome to Casa Luz, your El Raval escape in Barcelona. A classic sandstone exterior meets minimalist interior design. Each space features warm wooden furnishings, amber tilework, and cable television. Don’t worry about tidying up — daily housekeeping is complimentary. Breakfast at the rooftop restaurant is available for purchase. And with live evening music on the terrace, there’s no better place to savor the city views. This vibrant city is yours to discover, starting at Casa Luz.
neighborhood_overview: It's hard to describe the unique feel of being in this neighborhood. Lucky for us there's a word for it: ravalejar. To do as one does in El Raval. Buzz through the thriving streets of Barcelona's culture hive, where every corner is home to another nectarous treat. Lose yourself gazing into a contemporary masterpiece at MACBA. Lunch at La Boqueria, where market stalls burst with the freshest of produce. Or let loose with the lively aperitivo crowd of neighborhood bars and cafes. As the evening sets in, allow the ambient avenue of La Rambla to stroll you right to the starlit seaport.

neighborhood_overview:
Gracia is a unique neighborhood in Barcelona. With an exceptional environment, you can enjoy its beautiful pedestrian streets where you can find authentic local commerce and multiple artist studios. In addition, it is distinguished by wide squares surrounded by exquisite restaurants, both Spanish and international cuisine, and terrace bars where you can enjoy the sun. An excellent neighborhood to explore on foot, with beautiful surprises around every corner.

Centrally located, just a 10-minute walk from Paseo de Gracia, it is connected by public transport to reach the most famous points of the city such as Parc Güell, La Sagrada Familia, Casa Batlló, Casa Milá, and even Las Ramblas or the Gothic Quarter. You will easily find services around such as supermarkets, bookstores or pharmacies, among others.

A neighborhood, and especially a street, with great local activity that really reflects what life is like in Barcelona.

Hope to see you soon, 

The Streets Apartments team

name: Comfortable apartment with free parking
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is located in Poble Sec, a picturesque neighborhood in the center of Barcelona. You will be strategically located near Las Ramblas, Montjuic and the promenade. Trendy neighborhoods like El Raval and Born, where you'll enjoy the best shops and restaurants, are within walking distance.

A few meters from the apartment is the PARAL·LEL and DRASSANES metro stop on the green line (L3), which will take you directly to Passeig de Gracia, Plaza Catalunya, Camp Nou stadium and many other tourist attractions. That same metro line connects Plaza España and Sants Station, where there are trains and buses to Barcelona airport.
host_about: Conocer lugares nuevos es una de mis pasiones y sobretodo hacerlo a mi aire. Por eso en todos mis viajes me alojo en un apartamento. Esta es una de las razones por las que dejé mi trabajo en una importante empresa de servicios empresariales y ahora me dedico a seleccionar apartamentos y gestionarlos en mi ciudad. De esta forma puedo ofrecer a mis huéspedes los apartamentos del estilo que a busco cuando viajo! Espero que os gusten tanto como a mí!

Very well communicated and easy access to bus/metro/bicing.. etc. Bruc & bruc is located in the Eixample Dreta neighborhood, great for sightseeing and contemplate Gaudi´s work as well as other famous local architects.
