host_about:
Hello everyone! I'm Adriana Mateos and I'm part of BRUC & BRUC Barcelona  team with Daiane, Alex , Marielle and Sebastian.

We have been working in the sector for 5 years with a clear objective: to offer our passengers rooms with all the comfort and cutting-edge technology at competitive prices. We guarantee quality and the friendliest treatment to make the stay unforgettable. 
We currently have 3 hotels in the heart of Barcelona and we are in a continuous search for better offers and amenities.

Bruc & Bruc  Guesthouse team is young and dynamic and will welcome people who speak Spanish, English and Italian. We always offer personalized attention to all our clients from 09:00 a.m. to 10:00 p.m.

Of course, we are experts in tourism so whatever you doubt, let us know we will be happy to help you prepare your stay! We will offer you all kinds of tips and suggestions, the best places to eat, essential visits, ... all the information that may be useful! We want your stay with us to be really fantastic, our house is your home! We will wait for you! 

¡Hola a todos! Soy Adriana Mateos y soy parte del equipo de BRUC & BRUC GUESTHOUSE con Wildelys, Daiane y Luciano, Vanessa, Josefina.

Llevamos 5 años trabajando en el sector con un objetivo claro: ofrecer a nuestros pasajeros habitaciones con todas las comodidades y tecnología de vanguardia a precios competitivos. Garantizamos la calidad y el trato más amigable para que la estancia sea inolvidable.
Actualmente tenemos 3 hoteles en el corazón de Barcelona y estamos en una búsqueda continua de mejores ofertas y comodidades.

El equipo de habitaciones de Bruc & Bruc Guesthouse es joven y dinámico y dará la bienvenida a personas que hablan español, inglés e italiano. Siempre ofrecemos atención personalizada a todos nuestros clientes de 09:00 a.m. a 10:00 p.m.

Por supuesto, somos expertos en turismo, por lo que no dude en comentarnos, estaremos encantados de ayudarlo a preparar su estancia. Le ofreceremos todo tipo de consejos y sugerencias, los mejores lugares para comer, visitas esenciales, ... ¡toda la información que pueda ser útil! Queremos que su estancia con nosotros sea realmente fantástica, nuestra casa es su hogar. ¡Esperaremos por ti!

name: Exquisite Loft & Terrace Perfect for Couples/Fam
description:
Beautifully renovated loft located on the rooftop of a 1920's modernist building in the heart of Barcelona. This design loft features an outdoor space to enjoy sunbathing or dining, as well as a fully equipped modern kitchen. You will find various handmade elements from around the world, carefully picked
from my travels. Perfectly located between the emblematic Plaza España and the famous Gothic quarter of Barcelona. If location and quality are important for you , this is your ideal place!
neighborhood_overview: This loft is ideally located near the up and coming Sant Antoni area, which is home to its famous market, numerous amount of bars and restaurants ( some are even Michelin star ). neighborhood_overview:
For people who want to stay in the center of the city of Barcelona, the apartments in El Born are the best option. El Born is one of the most charming neighborhoods in the city. With its narrow streets lined with cafes and restaurants, it is an excellent option. Option for those who want to experience the most picturesque part of the city. The area is characterized by several historic buildings from the turn of the century and earlier, you can even discover structures dating back to the Middle Ages. Despite the strong presence of centuries past, El Born is one of the trendiest and most modern areas when it comes to apartments. he Born neighborhood is also known for its variety of authentic Catalan shops, which remain open throughout the day and well into the night. And for those looking for big international brands, the Plaza Catalunya shopping center is just a few minutes' walk away.

The exquisite selection of details that decorate our rooms naturally integrates the latest technology with a unique modern taste. 

Residents & guests enjoy extensive time in each destination, expert guides and in-depth expeditions to dense cities, ancient archeological wonders and modern-day marvels like anything you could experience elsewhere.

Our idea is to create something unique that makes the world special. Don’t miss this window of opportunity to witness our spectacular collection of unique homes and lifestyle.

description:
This three-bedroom apartment is found in the Eixample district, with space for up to 5 people. With WiFi and air conditioning it offers all you need for a wonderful break in Barcelona.

The living-diner has lots of natural light from the window, and has a sleek, modern design. You have the sofa & television to use to relax after a day spent exploring the city. Next to this space, you will find the dining table & chairs to use for meal times.
neighborhood_overview: Eixample is Catalan for 'extension', meaning an extension of the old Barcelona city, and it is one of the most popular districts in the Catalan capital. Eixample was designed by Catalan-born architect, Ildefons Cerdà, who took traffic and sunlight (amongst many other things) into consideration when drawing up the plans of the new area. Eixample is now characterised by its octagonal blocks and its grid-like pattern, with wide streets and both commercial and residential areas. It is split into two parts, Eixample Esquerra (Left, or in Spanish, Izquierdo) and Eixample Dret (Right, or in Spanish, Derecho), and is home to one of the most famous streets in Barcelona, Passeig de Gràcia, known for its high fashion stores and trendy restaurants. The street is intersected by the long Avinguda Diagonal, which runs through the entire city. Eixample Derecho is home to many gems of 'Modernisme' architecture, including the unique Casa Milà (La Pedrera), the colourful Casa Batlló and the towering Sagr
host_about:
Hi everyone! We are AB Apartment Barcelona, a local agency that offers accommodation options for those that want to visit our wonderful city. Let us tell you a bit more about us :)

We have been managing apartments since 2007 when David and Dani, founders and twin brothers, decided to rent their holiday apartment, personally welcoming every guest and sharing with them their recommendations and advice about Barcelona.  

Today, we have many more apartments to rent in the city, whilst maintaining the essence of our beginnings. Our team is formed by local people and others from all round the world, that will help you with any doubts you may have, either before, during, or after your stay. 

Barcelona is our home, so we will be able to advise you on the best places to visit, from sights and attractions, to local bars and restaurants. You can also consult more expert advice on our Blog, awarded as one of the best tourism blogs in Barcelona.

By renting your apartment in Barcelona through us, you’ll be in safe hands :) We are looking forward to meeting you soon!

DURING YOUR STAY

We will be happy to help you with everything you need to make your stay an unforgettable experience! In addition, you will have access to our customer area, from which you can check-in online, report any problem if necessary, as well as book apartment services, activities, transfers and access local guides about Barcelona. We also have an office open 365 days a year and we have 24-hour telephone assistance for any emergency.

host_about:
Choisis principalement pour leur emplacement et leur luminosité, nos appartements Casa Cosi ont minutieusement été rénovés afin de préserver leur caractère tout en leur apportant un maximum de confort : double vitrage, climatisation et chauffage central, salle de bain modernes, cuisines fonctionnelles, meubles et literie de qualité, équipements complets : TV, électroménager, vaisselle, linge de maison et bien sur une connexion internet avec wifi....

Nous avons choisi des emplacements centraux pour que touristes ou en voyage professionnel, vous puissiez profiter d'un quartier vivant qui vous ouvre les portes de la ville mais aussi bénéficier d'une grande offre de transports.

À Barcelone, notre quartier de prédilection est l’Eixample. Un quartier central, animé proche des Ramblas, du Passeo de Gracia, de la Plaça de Catalanuya et plaça Universitat. description: Welcome to Catalonia Square! This hotel with a modern, elegant and cosmopolitan design is located in the heart of Barcelona, right next to Plaça Catalunya and Passeig de Gràcia. These Junior Suite rooms have a living area with Chaise Longue, 2 TVs and a large furnished terrace and private heated pool with views, among others.
neighborhood_overview: Hotel located in the heart of the city, in the historic and commercial center of Barcelona, next to Plaça Catalunya and Passeig de Gràcia. Nearby places to highlight are the Gothic Quarter, the Cathedral, La Rambla, La Pedrera, Casa Batlló, among others.

neighborhood_overview:
This apartment is in the right area of l'Eixample and is prior Passeig de Sant Joan, another of Barcelona's beautiful boulevards, but is also alongside Gràcia, kind of Barcelona`s Montmartre with its artistic and cultural vitality.

Gràcia was an independent town until the late 19th century and even now the community is small and tight. The people are exceedingly proud of their roots (they say they are from Gràcies and not from Barcelona). The area is popular with artists and a generally bohemian crowd, it also has a high ethnic population and the highest concentration of foreign restaurants in Barcelona. However, despite the trendy nature of Gràcia, it is also a very traditional district with a large elderly population which makes for an amusing and odd mix - and very entertaining people-watching!

The apartment features an elegant living room, a fully equipped open-plan kitchen, and includes air conditioning, Wi-Fi, and a TV among other amenities. host_about:
I live in Barcelona, a city that has captivated me from the start for its culture, history and beauty. I work as a full-time host for Aspasios and couldn’t think of a better job: at Aspasios we love to make our guests feel at home. A big part of our job is listening carefully to our visitors: we learn so much from them every day. We enjoy meeting each and every person who comes to stay with us and want them to come back because of us. We pride ourselves on being professional and friendly at the same time. At Aspasios, we are passionate about hospitality.

My colleagues and I are always on hand to help you make the most of your trip to Barcelona. We know this lovely city inside out, so can recommend plenty of restaurants, bars and activities that you might not find in the guidebooks!

description:
Our most peaceful option, with rooms that face towards our inner courtyard. Ideal for those who seek the perfect balance between the bustle of the city and the calm that enjoying privacy brings.

host_about:
Welcome to Yurbban Ramblas Boutique Hotel!

You will be hosted in an old listed building on Las Ramblas in Barcelona, where Yurbban Ramblas Boutique Hotel has achieved the delicate balance of conserving this original spirit while providing all the benefits of modern-day design and comfort. 

We will be your guide to the city, advising you on how to get around, which places are worth a visit and which restaurants are better-suited to your tastes, helping you at all times with anything you may need.

So that you are aware of everything going on in the city, whenever your visit may be, we will keep you updated on the must-attend shows, events and key dates, so that you can make the best use of your time – just like a true local.

description: New! Fully serviced boutique apartment - professional 30 minute daily cleaning included monday through saturday. neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is located in the safe neighborhood of Eixample right next to the famous Sant Antoni market. It’s a great location if you want to discover city by feet. Ramblas and Plaza Catalunya are only approximately 10 minutes walking. The contemporary art museum is also just a few blocks away.

Sant Antoni, has become one of the up-and-coming neighborhoods in Barcelona the last years. Still offbeat from the mainstream tourism Sant Antoni maintains its authentic charm making it a favorite among the locals and trend-seekers.

The world famous chefs Ferran and Albert Adrià have opened several restaurants within walking distance. Just around the corner you will also find the hipster street “Parlament” – our favorite street to hang out, full of trendy shops, cafés, bars and restaurants.

neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is located in El Raval, a central Barcelona neighbourhood. In this area, you will find MACBA (the Museum of Contemporary Art) and you’ll be close to Las Ramblas, where you’ll find the colourful Mercat de la Boqueria. Here, you can sample some cheap and tasty fruit juices and awe at the array of fresh produce on offer at countless stalls. Nearby is Plaça Catalunya, Passeig de Gràcia and Portal de l'Àngel which all offer excellent shopping opportunities.

You will be steps away from a wealth of restaurants and cafés wherever you are in Raval. Recommended eateries include Palosanto Barcelona, a highly-rated tapas bar and restaurant serving typical Spanish cuisine. More delicious Spanish dishes can be found at Cera 23, and if you’re vegetarian you should try Sésamo and Flax&Kale. name: Casa Cosi - Casanova 7
description: Casa Cosi - Casanova 7 is located in the central Eixample district. This elegant 3-bedroom apartment is perfect to enjoy the true Barcelonese experience. It is located in one of the best districts of Barcelona: The Eixample district, a very lively neighborhood filled with art galleries, trendy restaurants, cafes and bars; which makes it popular among tourists and locals alike.
host_about:
Choisis principalement pour leur emplacement et leur luminosité, nos appartements Casa Cosi ont minutieusement été rénovés afin de préserver leur caractère tout en leur apportant un maximum de confort : double vitrage, climatisation et chauffage central, salle de bain modernes, cuisines fonctionnelles, meubles et literie de qualité, équipements complets : TV, électroménager, vaisselle, linge de maison et bien sur une connexion internet avec wifi....

Nous avons choisi des emplacements centraux pour que touristes ou en voyage professionnel, vous puissiez profiter d'un quartier vivant qui vous ouvre les portes de la ville mais aussi bénéficier d'une grande offre de transports.

À Barcelone, notre quartier de prédilection est l’Eixample. Un quartier central, animé proche des Ramblas, du Passeo de Gracia, de la Plaça de Catalanuya et plaça Universitat. Un quartier à l'architecture moderniste dans lequel les commerces, les restaurants et bars à tapas sont nombreux. Un quartier à partir duquel on se promène dans la ville.  

Notre structure de taille humaine nous permet d’être proche de vos attentes. Nous vous accueillons à votre arrivée pour vous présenter le lieu et le quartier, et restons joignables tout au long de votre séjour pour vous orienter et répondre à vos éventuelles demandes. N'hésitez pas à nous contacter.

Welcome to Casa Cosi !

name: AB Sagrada Familia Views  VII-III
neighborhood_overview: Eixample is Catalan for 'extension', meaning an extension of the old Barcelona city, and it is one of the most popular districts in the Catalan capital. Eixample was designed by Catalan-born architect, Ildefons Cerdà, who took traffic and sunlight (amongst many other things) into consideration when drawing up the plans of the new area. Eixample is now characterised by its octagonal blocks and its grid-like pattern, with wide streets and both commercial and residential areas. It is split into two parts, Eixample Esquerra (Left, or in Spanish, Izquierdo) and Eixample Dret (Right, or in Spanish, Derecho), and is home to one of the most famous streets in Barcelona, Passeig de Gràcia, known for its high fashion stores and trendy restaurants. The street is intersected by the long Avinguda Diagonal, which runs through the entire city. Eixample Derecho is home to many gems of 'Modernisme' architecture, including the unique Casa Milà (La Pedrera), the colourful Casa Batlló and the towering Sagr

name: Sweett I Eixample Borrell
description:
This gorgeous three-bedroom Sweett apartment in Barcelona's trendy Eixample neighbourhood has everything you need for an amazing stay. Just around the corner from a charming city park, you're within walking distance of museums, monuments, authentic tapas bars, great shopping, and more. The apartment's balcony and light-filled interior will give you a taste of the Barcelona sunshine.
Perfect for families or groups of friends for a memorable vacation.
neighborhood_overview: A modernist treasure trove full of elaborate and often fantastical buildings, elegant landscapes and upmarket fashion - there’s really something magical about Eixample.  The area sits on the right hand side of Passeig de Gràcia, the main boulevard that separates the city.  Its gridded layout keeps things nice and simple for walking around - most tourists flock to Gaudi’s emblematic Sagrada Familia church, but Eixample itself is a peaceful, residential neighbourhood that offers many an opportunity for a quite respite.  You could easily spend the day just popping in-and-out of the various artist galleries, small boutiques and neighbourhood cafes scattered about, that is if you can tear yourself away from the high-end shops that line the avenues.  To top it all off, Eixample is only two metro stops away from Placa Catalunya at the city centre.
host_about: Sweett (formerly Sweet Inn) invites you to enjoy comfort, convenience, and local charm in our thoughtfully designed apartments. With 10+ years of hosting experience, we ensure a home-like stay with cozy bedding, fast WiFi, and a Nespresso machine. Our 24/7 team assists with early check-ins, transfers, housekeeping, and local tips. Enjoy welcome treats, personalized recommendations, and our smart app. Sweett is your perfect base for urban escapes.

The University Square (Plaça Universitat in Catalan) is located in the center of Barcelona and is home to the historic building from the University of Barcelona. Plaça Universitat belongs to the Eixample district and connects with Ciutat Vella. (Old Town)

description:
This fantastic apartment is located on a royal fourth floor with an elevator from a modernist building from the year 1906, just 150 meters from Sagrada Familia. Preserving all the charm of the time without losing all kinds of amenities offered by this apartment.
Internet, washing machine, dishwasher, heating, etc.
A few meters from the apartment are all the services: Metro, Bus, Bicing, supers, restaurants and walking areas where you can enjoy the gastronomic offer of the area.
neighborhood_overview:
This apartment located in the (hamlet) district of Sagrada Familia, in the epicenter of its origins, since shortly after approving the Cerdà plan joined with Barcelona through a road today called Carrer València and interconnects Sant Martí de Provençals with Barcelona. There are still those passages that in order to align the grids of the Eixample were reorganized to be able to maintain the neighbors of the area.
Active, multicultural, young neighborhood, where people from all over the world reside along with those of all life , food market, municipal library, and where without moving from the neighborhood you can supply yourself with all kinds of needs.
In the pure center of the city, because Gaudí settled the temple the crypt and the birth, looking at the map of the city, in the center. For the temple was to be for all citizens both rich and poor and at the same distance between mountain and sea. Like a cross.

name: Loft con dos balcones en el barrio gótico
description:
Welcome to our amazing loft studio in the heart of Barcelona's Gothic Quarter!
This temporary accommodation is perfect for workers, master's or bachelor's students, or for those who come to the city for the first time and are looking for a temporary home. With a strategic location, it is very easy to plan your visit from here.

- Minimum stay of 32 nights -
neighborhood_overview:
The Gothic Quarter is one of the oldest and most emblematic neighborhoods in the city of Barcelona, located in the heart of the historic center of the city. This neighborhood is characterized by its narrow medieval streets, historical buildings, churches, squares and museums.

The Gothic Quarter is a labyrinth of narrow cobbled streets that retain the charm of medieval times. The neighborhood is bounded by Via Laietana, Plaza Cataluña, Paseo de Colón and Ronda de Sant Pere.

Among the main attractions of the Gothic Quarter are the Barcelona Cathedral, which is one of the most important symbols of the city and has a Gothic cloister and a neo-Gothic façade. There is also the Basilica of Santa María del Pi, the Palau de la Generalitat, Plaza Sant Jaume, the Portal del Ángel, Plaza del Rey and the Picasso Museum, which houses an important collection of works by the genius from Malaga.

The Gothic Quarter is a perfect place to enjoy the historical architecture,

neighborhood_overview:
The Gothic Quarter is one of the oldest and most emblematic neighborhoods of the city of Barcelona, located in the middle of the historic center of the city. This neighborhood is characterized by its narrow medieval streets, historic buildings, churches, squares and museums.

The Gothic Quarter is a maze of narrow cobbled alleys that retain the charm of medieval times. The neighbourhood is bordered by Via Laietana, Plaça Catalunya, Passeig de Colom and Ronda de Sant Pere.

Among the main attractions of the Gothic Quarter is the Cathedral of Barcelona, one of the most important symbols of the city and which has a Gothic cloister and a neo-Gothic style facade. There is also the Basilica of Santa Maria del Pi, the Palau de la Generalitat, Plaça Sant Jaume, the Portal de l 'Angel, Plaça del Rei and the Picasso Museum, which houses an important collection of works by the genius from Malaga.

The Gothic Quarter is a perfect place to enjoy the historical architec

name: Sonder Paseo de Gracia | Twin Single Room, Balcony
description: The adventure starts at Paseo de Gracia. Named after the iconic street it overlooks, the elegant façade features wrought-iron balconies and beautiful stone details. There are stunning views on the rooftop terrace. And breakfast is available for an additional fee. High-end stores, historic buildings, and thriving bars and restaurants line the streets of Eixample. We love the iconic masterpieces of Antonio Gaudi's Casa Batlló and Casa Milà. Get the best of Barcelona at Paseo de Gracia.
neighborhood_overview: As Barcelona’s most recognizable neighborhood, Eixample is a late 19th-century urban development known for its dazzling Art Nouveau architecture. Named the "Expansion" in Catalan, the district is characterized by its geometric grid layout and is located north of Plaça de Catalunya. Admire Modernist townhouses that line the main streets, or stop by a cozy sidewalk café to people-watch while sipping a café con leche or cortado. Don’t miss the chance to visit Casa Batlló, Casa Milà, and the unfinished Sagrada Familia, all stunning attractions designed by world-famous Catalan architect, Antoni Gaudí. With stylish boutiques, upscale eateries, and more all within walking distance, spend your days exploring everything that this unparalleled neighborhood has to offer.
host_about: Rooms, suites, and apartments in over 40 cities around the world. Every Sonder features designer details, keyless entry, and fast free WiFi. Experience a better way to stay today.

host_about:
Somos unos apasionados de los viajes. Tanto, que ¡nos hemos convertido en profesionales! 

Estamos muy orgullosos de haber empezado alquilando apartamentos en Barcelona a viajeros nacionales e internacionales. Llevamos más de una década alquilando apartamentos a familias, grupos de amigos, parejas... y realmente siempre ha sido una experiencia muy gratificante para nosotros. Cuando viajamos con nuestros niños, o cuando podemos escaparnos un fin de semana solos, es la opción de alojamiento que más nos gusta. Tenemos independencia, comodidad, conocemos muchos anfitriones nos enriquecen con sus historias y consejos sobre la ciudad y vivimos la ciudad casi casi como un local más.

Nos gusta sentirnos a gusto cuando viajamos, por eso es lo que intentamos ofrecer siempre a nuestros huéspedes. Tenemos un pequeño equipo que nos ayuda para lograr una mejor atención y que se esfuerza por hacer de la experiencia lo mejor posible.

Lodging Team

name: AB Vila i Vilá Apartment  III-II
description: This three bedroom apartment in Barcelona is perfect for families and/or groups. It is located just off Paral-lel street, one of the most well-known in Barcelona, and is just a few minutes’ stroll from the Port and Las Ramblas. It has excellent public transport connections to the city’s main attractions and is surrounded by plenty of bars and restaurants, plus many places for entertainment, including several theaters.
host_about:
Hi everyone! We are AB Apartment Barcelona, a local agency that offers accommodation options for those that want to visit our wonderful city. Let us tell you a bit more about us :)

We have been managing apartments since 2007 when David and Dani, founders and twin brothers, decided to rent their holiday apartment, personally welcoming every guest and sharing with them their recommendations and advice about Barcelona.  

Today, we have many more apartments to rent in the city, whilst maintaining the essence of our beginnings. Our team is formed by local people and others from all round the world, that will help you with any doubts you may have, either before, during, or after your stay. 

Barcelona is our home, so we will be able to advise you on the best places to visit, from sights and attractions, to local bars and restaurants. You can also consult more expert advice on our Blog, awarded as one of the best tourism blogs in Barcelona.

By renting your apartment in Barcelona through us, you’ll be in safe hands :) We are looking forward to meeting you soon!

DURING YOUR STAY

We will be happy to help you with everything you need to make your stay an unforgettable experience! In addition, you will have access to our customer area, from which you can check-in online, report any problem if necessary, as well as book apartment services, activities, transfers and access local guides about Barcelona. We also have an office open 365 days a year and we have 24-hour telephone assistance for any emergency.

name: Bright 4BD with terrace near Arc de Triomf
description: The Collection Barcelona welcomes you to our modern and bright 4 bedroom / 2 bathroom flat, located at the heart of Barcelona's City Center, perfect for those traveling with children or friends. The neighborhood is safe and family-friendly with plenty to do on your doorstep. The apartment is located next to Arc de Triomf and Ciutadella's park.
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is well connected to Paseig de Sant Joan, a wide avenue that connects the neighbourhood of Gràcia with the Arc del Triomf right by the Born district. It doesn't just link two of the city's coolest neighbourhoods, it has recently become the go-to place for Barcelona locals. The stretch between Carrer València and Carrer Casp and the surrounding area has been newly laid out making it ideal for cyclists and pedestrians. It has become a hotspot with interesting bars and restaurants, delightful shops and places that will simply amaze you. In a nutshell… you can't afford to miss it.
host_about:
Hi, I am Laura! 

Born and raised in Barcelona, and with background on hospitality management. I have always loved traveling myself, but also sharing the beauty and wonders of Barcelona with others, so a few years ago I started renting my apartments to travelers coming to the city so I could share my insights and hidden secrets about Barcelona :)

I am working together with a professional team of people managing the apartments, available 24/7 during your stay and with the same focus on personal and attentive services. All my apartments are in Eixample district, an ideal spot for culture and gastronomy lovers, the perfect area to explore the city and enjoy from the catalan atmosphere. 

Would love to host you!

name: Sweett | Villarroel 222
description: This lovely two-bedroom apartment is full of natural light. The comfortable furniture and the beautiful mixture of colours offer the place a welcoming and relaxing spirit. You will love cooking a Spanish meal in your kitchen or just trying one of the many restaurants in the neighbourhood.  Located in the heart of the city you will find many of the most beautiful landmarks in the city at only a few minutes' walk from the apartment.
neighborhood_overview: A modernist treasure trove full of elaborate and often fantastical buildings, elegant landscapes and upmarket fashion - there’s really something magical about Eixample.  The area sits on the right hand side of Passeig de Gràcia, the main boulevard that separates the city.  Its gridded layout keeps things nice and simple for walking around - most tourists flock to Gaudi’s emblematic Sagrada Familia church, but Eixample itself is a peaceful, residential neighbourhood that offers many an opportunity for a quite respite.  You could easily spend the day just popping in-and-out of the various artist galleries, small boutiques and neighbourhood cafes scattered about, that is if you can tear yourself away from the high-end shops that line the avenues.  To top it all off, Eixample is only two metro stops away from Placa Catalunya at the city centre.
host_about: Sweett (formerly Sweet Inn) invites you to enjoy comfort, convenience, and local charm in our thoughtfully designed apartments. With 10+ years of hosting experience, we ensure a home-like stay with cozy bedding, fast WiFi, and a Nespresso machine. Our 24/7 team assists with early check-ins, transfers, housekeeping, and local tips. Enjoy welcome treats, personalized recommendations, and our smart app. Sweett is your perfect base for urban escapes.

name: Gran apartamento nuevo! A 2`del metro P8
neighborhood_overview:
Castellano
El emblemático Barrio de Sants es uno de los lugares más visitados por el turismo mundial. Es un barrio seguro!
Sus calles antiguas, su casco histórico, sumado a la excelente comunicación a través del Bus o el Metro.
Con el metro de badal a solo 2/3 minutos, para ir al aeropuerto o al centro en 5 minutos. Es muy facil!!
Barrio de buena gente
Con supermercados enormes, grandes restaurantes, cafeterías muy buenas para desayunar o comer por €2 o €3, cine, parking.
Muy bien comunicado por metro y por bus, con sus estaciones muy cerca del piso a unos 2 o 3 minutos!
Lavanderías muy buenas y economicas a solo 5 minutos.
La Rambla de Badal está a 5 minutos y tiene un buen ambiente para cenar por la noche y dar un paseo en un ambiente de seguridad.
Por esto el Barrio de Sants es uno de los mejores barrios de Barcelona para vivir en una comunidad muy tranquila y familiar.

name: Bright apartment in Gràcia for families
neighborhood_overview:
Gràcia is a district in Barcelona which gathers the charm of tradition with the freshness of modernity. It was once an independent town. However, nowadays, it is the core of a district that includes other neighbourhoods such as Vallcarca Pentitents or Salut. All this area is very popular for its nightlife. You can also find a great number of boutiques and a variety of bars and restaurants.

The district of Gràcia is home to many students. There is as well a community of artists, actors, musicians, photographers and designers. They all contribute to the “bohemian” environment which is characteristic of the place. You can easily access the most emblematic places of the city from here (the Casa Fuster, Parc Guell, Casa Vicens, Paseo de Gracia, Gracia squares, etc.).

name: Sweett | Palau 601
description: Located in Barcelona’s vibrant city centre, this lovely one-bedroom Sweett apartment introduces you to the Spanish charm. Our local designer has created a space that combines contemporary sophistication with a touch of modernity. The large windows will offer you stunning views of the city. This apartment is surrounded by restaurants, bars, stunning architecture, and the city’s most famous cultural attractions, including the magnificent Sagrada Familia.
neighborhood_overview: A modernist treasure trove full of elaborate and often fantastical buildings, elegant landscapes and upmarket fashion - there’s really something magical about Eixample.  The area sits on the right hand side of Passeig de Gràcia, the main boulevard that separates the city.  Its gridded layout keeps things nice and simple for walking around - most tourists flock to Gaudi’s emblematic Sagrada Familia church, but Eixample itself is a peaceful, residential neighbourhood that offers many an opportunity for a quite respite.  You could easily spend the day just popping in-and-out of the various artist galleries, small boutiques and neighbourhood cafes scattered about, that is if you can tear yourself away from the high-end shops that line the avenues.  To top it all off, Eixample is only two metro stops away from Placa Catalunya at the city centre.
host_about: Sweett (formerly Sweet Inn) invites you to enjoy comfort, convenience, and local charm in our thoughtfully designed apartments. With 10+ years of hosting experience, we ensure a home-like stay with cozy bedding, fast WiFi, and a Nespresso machine. Our 24/7 team assists with early check-ins, transfers, housekeeping, and local tips. Enjoy welcome treats, personalized recommendations, and our smart app. Sweett is your perfect base for urban escapes.

description:
Double room with a queen size bed in a just renewed apartment.

It's a modern, quiet and sunny flat with a small balcony from where you can get a glimpse of the sea. The ideal place to stay and relax after an exhausting day wandering around the city.
host_about: Hi, It's Anna here. I am looking forward to help you discover my amazing city: Barcelona. I am myself a big fan of travelling, I love discovering new places and cultures and whenever I'm at home I like to host people from all over the world. I find meeting other people fascinating, everyone has a unique story to tell

name: Eixample Dret. Acogedor apartmento, 1 Dormitorio
description:
Paseo Ssn Juan/Aragon. Coqueto apartment equipped for long stays . sofa bed and 1 double bed in the room. Premium location a few meters from Av Diagonal. Ideally for couples or families who want to get to know Barcelona Real.

It is a coqueto apartment with high ceilings and wooden beams, outside to a quiet and not very spacious block patio. It has sun in the morning. All rooms have Windows.
neighborhood_overview:
The Paseo de Sant Joan is located on the Dreta de l'Eixample, starts in the Travessera de Gràcia and goes down until you come across the imposing Arc de Triomphe and the Ciutadella Park. Despite not being as well known as Passeig de Gràcia, Sant Joan has its own charms and some of the most hidden modernist buildings, such as Casa Macaya, by the architect Puig i Cadafalch, which was even proposed to be the headquarters of the CaixaForum.

Dreta de l'Eixample is a busy neighborhood that is characterized by its wide avenues with modernist apartment buildings and emblematic buildings of the architect Antoni Gaudí, such as the Sagrada Familia, the Casa Batlló, the Pedrera and the Casa Atmetller. International boutiques and luxury restaurants abound on Passeig de Gràcia and Rambla de Catalunya. In Plaça de Catalunya there are department stores, cafes with terraces and different means of transport

name: Blueground | El Camp d'en Grassot i Gràcia Nova
description: Feel at home wherever you choose to live with Blueground. You’ll love this beautiful Galvany furnished two bedroom apartment with its modern decor, fully equipped kitchen, and spacious living room with great views. Ideally located, you’re close to all the best that Barcelona has to offer! (ID #BCN20)
neighborhood_overview:
An ideal blend of city and country, the Sarrià-Sant Gervasi district straddles the city grid and the slopes of Mt. Tibidabo. The southern portion of the district is home to world-class shopping and dining, with everything from sushi to tapas bars on offer and both independent and brand-name boutiques. The more rural portion of Sarrià-Sant Gervasi includes highlights such as the Vallvidrera Reservoir, a perfect place for a long walk in nature, and the Parque de Atracciones, accessible via a funicular railway.
Sant Gervasi – Galvany is mostly residential in character, though elegant cava bars attract crowds. The Mercat del Galvany is the perfect place to find regional cheese and charcuterie. Another highlight is the Jardí de la Fundación Julio Muñoz Ramonet, a park with landscaped gardens.
host_about:
We’re Blueground, a global proptech company with several thousand move-in-ready apartments in a growing number of major cities around the world. With flexible terms and homes in vibrant, centrally based neighborhoods, you’ll feel at home and free to roam for as long as you want — a month, a year, or longer. 

Each apartment is thoughtfully designed with exclusive furnishings, fully equipped kitchens, and incredible amenities – making every day a five-star experience. From day one, you’ll enjoy high-speed Wi-Fi, premium linens, and smart home entertainment. Plus, access to pools, gyms, and outdoor spaces in select buildings.

Why stress over your apartment? We provide a hassle-free alternative — a consistent, quality guest experience that starts even before you arrive. Because we let you book our most up-to-date apartment listings online, confirm with a click, pay securely, and check in easily. 

During your stay
Upon arrival, you’ll either be greeted personally by a Blueground team member or given self-check-in instructions. The entire apartment is yours! You’ll enjoy reliable support via email, phone, and our Guest App, where you can request everything from a home cleaning to extra towels. 

We’ll share all details upon confirmation of your stay.

neighborhood_overview:
La Nova Esquerra de l'Eixample is a multicultural neighborhood that is home to the Joan Miró Park, a green area flanked by palm trees that owes its name to the artist who created its imposing central sculpture "Woman and Bird". In this same area, we find Casa Golferichs, a Gothic and modernist style mansion, where chamber music concerts and photography exhibitions are organized. Lastly, we have La Modelo Prison, a sadly famous male prison since 1904 and now it houses a museum.
Being a multicultural neighborhood, you can find all kinds of gastronomy

neighborhood_overview:
Welcome to Les Corts, an enchanting district in the heart of Barcelona that offers a perfect blend of tradition, modernity, and a vibrant local atmosphere. From historic landmarks to bustling markets and serene parks, Les Corts beckons you to explore its treasures and experience the true essence of this captivating city.

Historical Gems:
Step back in time as you wander through the historic streets of Les Corts. Marvel at architectural wonders like the stunning Monastery of Pedralbes, a centuries-old masterpiece that whispers tales of the past. Immerse yourself in the rich heritage that's seamlessly intertwined with the contemporary urban landscape.

It has 1 double bed, a work table, a kitchenette and a private bathroom.

- Minimum stay of 32 nights -
neighborhood_overview:
The Gothic Quarter is one of the oldest and most emblematic neighborhoods in the city of Barcelona, located in the heart of the historic center of the city. This neighborhood is characterized by its narrow medieval streets, historical buildings, churches, squares and museums.

The Gothic Quarter is a labyrinth of narrow cobbled streets that retain the charm of medieval times. The neighborhood is bounded by Via Laietana, Plaza Cataluña, Paseo de Colón and Ronda de Sant Pere.

Among the main attractions of the Gothic Quarter are the Barcelona Cathedral, which is one of the most important symbols of the city and has a Gothic cloister and a neo-Gothic façade. There is also the Basilica of Santa María del Pi, the Palau de la Generalitat, Plaza Sant Jaume, the Portal del Ángel, Plaza del Rey and the Picasso Museum, which houses an important collection of works by the genius from Malaga.

The Gothic Quarter is a perfect place to enjoy the historical architecture,

neighborhood_overview: A modernist treasure trove full of elaborate and often fantastical buildings, elegant landscapes and upmarket fashion - there’s really something magical about Eixample.  The area sits on the right hand side of Passeig de Gràcia, the main boulevard that separates the city.  Its gridded layout keeps things nice and simple for walking around - most tourists flock to Gaudi’s emblematic Sagrada Familia church, but Eixample itself is a peaceful, residential neighbourhood that offers many an opportunity for a quite respite.  You could easily spend the day just popping in-and-out of the various artist galleries, small boutiques and neighbourhood cafes scattered about, that is if you can tear yourself away from the high-end shops that line the avenues.  To top it all off, Eixample is only two metro stops away from Placa Catalunya at the city centre.

neighborhood_overview: Avenida Diagonal is located in the heart of Barcelona's Eixample district, a coveted neighborhood known for its tree-lined streets, upscale boutiques, and world-class dining. This iconic thoroughfare is steps away from some of the city's finest restaurants and bars, making it an ideal location for foodies and nightlife enthusiasts. And for those who love to shop, Avenida Diagonal is home to some seriously excellent shopping, with designer stores, high-end fashion boutiques, and trendy concept stores all within easy reach. With so much to see and do in the surrounding area, Avenida Diagonal is the perfect location for travelers looking to experience the best of Barcelona.
host_about:
Hi, I’m Viola, Founder of VDB Luxury Property Management. Originally from Italy, I have lived and worked in many different countries. Prior to starting VDB Property Management, I spent 20 years leading marketing and advertising for a large international customer-centric company.  My main differentiator from the competition is that my experience with different cultures taught me the importance of quality service. I come from a business where it’s all about making things happen, with speed quality and stress-free journey for my clients. This is why the only way to reach 100% of my clients´ satisfaction is to provide a fully customized service. But this is not enough. I believe that trust is the base of any relationship.  When I act on behalf of my client, my main thinking is always the same: “ what would I do if it was my own money?” With that in mind, I am sure that the answer is always in my client’s interest.

How can I help you? Thank you, gracias, grazie, merci!

description: If there’s one thing better than travelling to Barcelona, it’s living in Barcelona. And there’s no better place than Las Ramblas for exploring the city and discovering new places, new experiences and new people.
host_about:
Somos unos apasionados de los viajes. Tanto, que ¡nos hemos convertido en profesionales! 

Estamos muy orgullosos de haber empezado alquilando apartamentos en Barcelona a viajeros nacionales e internacionales. Llevamos más de una década alquilando apartamentos a familias, grupos de amigos, parejas... y realmente siempre ha sido una experiencia muy gratificante para nosotros. Cuando viajamos con nuestros niños, o cuando podemos escaparnos un fin de semana solos, es la opción de alojamiento que más nos gusta. Tenemos independencia, comodidad, conocemos muchos anfitriones nos enriquecen con sus historias y consejos sobre la ciudad y vivimos la ciudad casi casi como un local más.

Nos gusta sentirnos a gusto cuando viajamos, por eso es lo que intentamos ofrecer siempre a nuestros huéspedes. Tenemos un pequeño equipo que nos ayuda para lograr una mejor atención y que se esfuerza por hacer de la experiencia lo mejor posible. 

Esperamos verte pronto! Y no dudes en contactarnos para lo que necesites. 

Lodging Team

description:

name: Catalonia Albeniz 3* Hotel - Double room
description: Welcome to the Catalonia Albéniz! This hotel is located near the Sagrada Familia, in Aragó street, the main artery of the city. It offers a wide range of tourist and leisure activities in the surrounding area, such as the Agbar Tower and the Les Glòries shopping centre. It is also close to the Sant Pau Modernist Site, recently converted into a museum. It is perfectly communicated with the city centre and with the train service to the airport. The double rooms are spacious and comfortable.
neighborhood_overview: Located in the Clot district and just a few minutes from the Sagrada Familia, this hotel is perfectly connected to several areas of tourist interest. It is close to Plaça de les Glòries Catalanes, with its modern buildings and the Glòries Tower, and the city centre is easily accessible by public transport. Another area to highlight is the Poblenou district.

name: Cozy apartment with terrace/ Beach
description: Located in the quietest area of Barceloneta and 3 min. walk from the beach and Hospital Del Mar, this duplex with two terraces is a unique home in Barcelona. Spacious and bright, it offers all modern comforts and is ideal for hosting 3 or 4 people who want to live in the heart of Barcelona, but next to the sea. Temporary stay, from 32 nights. The reservation commits the guest to deliver their documentation, by law.
neighborhood_overview: La Barceloneta is one of the most popular and charismatic neighborhoods in Barcelona. It is a fishing neighborhood full of magic and history that is located in the district of Port Vell.  The neighborhood borders the Olympic Port, the Olympic Village, Borne, and Port Vell, all connected by a long palm-lined promenade. It is home to the most famous beaches in the city: Barceloneta Beach, Somorrostro, Sant Sebastià, and Sant Miquel, where the locals go surfing, sunbathe or eat outdoors in seafood restaurants and traditional tapas bars.  Despite having acquired a more modern appearance, La Barceloneta today retains its special charm. Its narrow streets and facades darkened by sea salt have made this area one of the most appreciated in Barcelona, a place with a calm, seafaring, and family atmosphere that remains far from the big city.  To discover the charm of the neighborhood, there is nothing better than getting lost in its narrow streets without worrying about your direction, or stoppin

description: Enjoy your stay in Barcelona in this bright & cosy one-bedroom apartment, situated in El Raval, complete with balcony & decorated interior!
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is located in El Raval, a central Barcelona neighbourhood. In this area, you will find MACBA (the Museum of Contemporary Art) and you’ll be close to Las Ramblas, where you’ll find the colourful Mercat de la Boqueria. Here, you can sample some cheap and tasty fruit juices and awe at the array of fresh produce on offer at countless stalls. Nearby is Plaça Catalunya, Passeig de Gràcia and Portal de l'Àngel which all offer excellent shopping opportunities.

You will be steps away from a wealth of restaurants and cafés wherever you are in Raval. Recommended eateries include Palosanto Barcelona, a highly-rated tapas bar and restaurant serving typical Spanish cuisine. More delicious Spanish dishes can be found at Cera 23, and if you’re vegetarian you should try Sésamo and Flax&Kale. Take advantage of the common areas, perfect for socializing and making connections. Don't miss your chance to live in one of the city's mos
neighborhood_overview:
"Barcelona’s most expansive neighbourhood is an architectural and cultural marvel. For many locals, it’s the only place to be. A map that’s easy to follow in a neighbourhood full of life.
The Eixample Esquerra is a safe and exciting area in town, as comfortable as it gets. The streets that form this quarter are wide, easy to follow, adorned with trees and bike trails and community spaces with benches and pedestrian paths. There is a perfect balance between everyday life (you can find good supermarkets, gyms and yoga studios, butchers and fresh groceries) and exciting “things to do”, such as art galleries, fashion boutiques, beauty parlours and restaurants of all kinds, from Michelin stars to local and authentic tapas bars."

At Badi, we believe that finding a new home should be an exciting and enjoyable experience. That's why we've made it our mission to make the process of finding a mid-term rental as easy and stress-free as possible. Whether you're a student, professional, or simply on a long-term vacation, we've got you covered.

We understand that moving to a new city can be daunting, which is why we've made sure to include all the necessary amenities and services to make your transition as smooth as possible. From fully furnished properties to all-inclusive pricing, we take care of all the details so you can focus on what really matters. Our properties are carefully curated and inspected to ensure they meet our high standards of quality and comfort.

We pride ourselves on our commitment to trust and transparency. Our platform is designed to make it easy for you to find the perfect accommodation and to book it with confidence. From 24/7 customer support to verified reviews, we've got your back every step of the way.

neighborhood_overview:
The Eixample area is not only the most well-known part of Barcelona, but it also offers the greatest variety of attractions. This neighborhood is home to many of Gaudí's most recognizable works, including the Sagrada Familia and Casa Batlló.
The Eixample neighborhood is a great place to stay in Barcelona. The main reason is the abundance of convenient amenities within a short stroll, be they a restaurant, shop, supermarket, or bar.
One of the city's liveliest and most well-known shopping districts may be found in the Eixample.
In addition to some of Barcelona's most magnificent landmarks, the areas around Passeig de Gràcia, Plaça Catalunya, and Diagonal Avenue are home to the city's most upscale boutiques.

name: Rocafort | Elegant 3BR in Eixample
description: This spacious apartment is filled with light, comfortable furniture, and fun artwork on the walls. The furniture is stark and clean and the bright yellow and red accents throughout give the space a fun, inviting feel. Lively flying bird decals on the dining area wall are cheerful and festive. The three bedrooms have high-quality beds for a perfect night’s sleep and the bathroom and the fully equipped kitchen will make you feel right at home. Friends or families will love this apartment.
neighborhood_overview: A modernist treasure trove full of elaborate and often fantastical buildings, elegant landscapes and upmarket fashion - there’s really something magical about Eixample.  The area sits on the right hand side of Passeig de Gràcia, the main boulevard that separates the city.  Its gridded layout keeps things nice and simple for walking around - most tourists flock to Gaudi’s emblematic Sagrada Familia church, but Eixample itself is a peaceful, residential neighbourhood that offers many an opportunity for a quite respite.  You could easily spend the day just popping in-and-out of the various artist galleries, small boutiques and neighbourhood cafes scattered about, that is if you can tear yourself away from the high-end shops that line the avenues.  To top it all off, Eixample is only two metro stops away from Placa Catalunya at the city centre.

description:

neighborhood_overview:
In the heart of the Gracia neighborhood, one of the most charming neighborhoods in Barcelona, ​​we find Caliu Gracia, a building that offers comfortable and practical apartments, fully equipped and decorated in a modern as well as functional style.

Gracia is a bohemian district that stands out for its 19th-century pedestrian streets full of alternative boutiques, galleries and movie theaters. It is characterized by its multitude of small squares full of bistros serving Catalan cuisine and wine bars, where those who visit it can enjoy social and playful life, making this neighborhood one of the most charismatic in the city. You will find examples of Antoni Gaudí's modernist architecture throughout the area, from Casa Vicens to Park Güell. Perfectly communicated, it is just a few minutes from two metro stops that will take you to any corner of the city.

host_about:
Somos unos apasionados de los viajes. Tanto, que ¡nos hemos convertido en profesionales! 

Estamos muy orgullosos de haber empezado alquilando apartamentos en Barcelona a viajeros nacionales e internacionales. Llevamos más de una década alquilando apartamentos a familias, grupos de amigos, parejas... y realmente siempre ha sido una experiencia muy gratificante para nosotros. Cuando viajamos con nuestros niños, o cuando podemos escaparnos un fin de semana solos, es la opción de alojamiento que más nos gusta. Tenemos independencia, comodidad, conocemos muchos anfitriones nos enriquecen con sus historias y consejos sobre la ciudad y vivimos la ciudad casi casi como un local más.

Nos gusta sentirnos a gusto cuando viajamos, por eso es lo que intentamos ofrecer siempre a nuestros huéspedes. Tenemos un pequeño equipo que nos ayuda para lograr una mejor atención y que se esfuerza por hacer de la experiencia lo mejor posible. 

Esperamos verte pronto! Y no dudes en contactarnos para lo que necesites. 

Lodging Team

description: Say “buenos días” to a better Barcelona stay at Los Arcos. With black iron pillars and balustraded windows, this building adds to the charm of the Gothic Quarter. Each space includes a kitchenette, desk, and Roku for streaming. This central location is perfect for exploring. Plaça Reial is our favorite spot to relax with a glass of sangria. And Mercado de la Boqueria offers an array of eats to satisfy every palate. Whatever brings you to Barcelona, Los Arcos is never far from the action.
neighborhood_overview: As the historic heart of Barcelona, the lively beat of the beautiful Gothic Quarter pulses through the city. Also known as the Barri Gòtic, the neighborhood is an intriguing labyrinth that layers the bustling business of modern life amidst celebrated landmarks and upon centuries-old architecture. The spectacular gothic Cathedral of Barcelona overlooks thriving boutiques and cafés along stone-paved streets that are ripe for exploration and afternoon ambling.  Meandering alleyways and arched passages open to tranquil sunlit plaças and to the teeming avenues of La Rambla and Via Leitana which flank the neighborhood. Intricate wrought-iron street lamps illuminate the quarter as it transforms into its evening splendor. Bars and restaurants burst into activity on flourishing squares like Plaça Reial, while the nightlife crowd spills in and out of the secluded spots of narrower streets.

neighborhood_overview: Eixample is Catalan for 'extension', meaning an extension of the old Barcelona city, and it is one of the most popular districts in the Catalan capital. Eixample was designed by Catalan-born architect, Ildefons Cerdà, who took traffic and sunlight (amongst many other things) into consideration when drawing up the plans of the new area. Eixample is now characterised by its octagonal blocks and its grid-like pattern, with wide streets and both commercial and residential areas. It is split into two parts, Eixample Esquerra (Left, or in Spanish, Izquierdo) and Eixample Dret (Right, or in Spanish, Derecho), and is home to one of the most famous streets in Barcelona, Passeig de Gràcia, known for its high fashion stores and trendy restaurants. The street is intersected by the long Avinguda Diagonal, which runs through the entire city. Eixample Derecho is home to many gems of 'Modernisme' architecture, including the unique Casa Milà (La Pedrera), the colourful Casa Batlló and the towering Sagr
host_about:
Hi everyone! We are AB Apartment Barcelona, a local agency that offers accommodation options for those that want to visit our wonderful city. Let us tell you a bit more about us :)

We have been managing apartments since 2007 when David and Dani, founders and twin brothers, decided to rent their holiday apartment, personally welcoming every guest and sharing with them their recommendations and advice about Barcelona.  

Today, we have many more apartments to rent in the city, whilst maintaining the essence of our beginnings. Our team is formed by local people and others from all round the world, that will help you with any doubts you may have, either before, during, or after your stay. 

Barcelona is our home, so we will be able to advise you on the best places to visit, from sights and attractions, to local bars and restaurants. You can also consult more expert advice on our Blog, awarded as one of the best tourism blogs in Barcelona.

By renting your apartment in Barcelona through us, you’ll be in safe hands :) We are looking forward to meeting you soon!

DURING YOUR STAY

We will be happy to help you with everything you need to make your stay an unforgettable experience! In addition, you will have access to our customer area, from which you can check-in online, report any problem if necessary, as well as book apartment services, activities, transfers and access local guides about Barcelona. We also have an office open 365 days a year and we have 24-hour telephone assistance for any emergency.

name: 3BR, 2BATH Art Nouveau Apartment
neighborhood_overview: The apartment's location, the barrio of Eixample, is characterized by long straight streets, a strict grid pattern crossed by wide avenues, and square blocks with chamfered corners (named "illes" in Catalan, and "manzanas con chaflán" in Spanish). This was a visionary, pioneering design by Ildefons Cerdà, who considered traffic and transport along with sunlight and ventilation in coming up with his characteristic octagonal blocks, where the streets broaden at every intersection making for greater visibility, better ventilation and (today) some short-stay parking space. The grid pattern remains as a hallmark of Barcelona. The important needs of the inhabitants were incorporated into his plan, which called for markets, schools, hospitals every so many blocks. Today, most of the markets remain open in the spots they have been from the beginning. You will find something to suit every taste in this area, design and fashion shops, relaxing parks and a range of bars and cafes to have your mor

neighborhood_overview: El Born is a historic neighborhood located in the Ciutat Vella district of Barcelona. It is known for its narrow, winding streets, and well-preserved medieval architecture. The neighborhood is home to several important landmarks, including the Basilica of Santa Maria del Mar, one of the most important examples of Catalan Gothic architecture in the city. The Picasso Museum, which houses a large collection of works by the famous artist, is also located in El Born. Additionally, the neighborhood is known for its lively atmosphere, with a wide variety of bars, restaurants, and shops catering to both tourists and locals. El Born is also home to several parks and open spaces, such as the Parc de la Ciutadella, which offers a peaceful retreat from the hustle and bustle of the city. Overall, El Born is a unique and vibrant neighborhood that offers a glimpse into the history and culture of Barcelona.

neighborhood_overview:
The neighborhood of L'Eixample in Barcelona is one of the city's most iconic and cosmopolitan neighborhoods. It is known for its modernist architecture and unique urban design, with its famous blocks of square buildings intersecting at right angles.

The district of L'Eixample is divided into two parts: left and right. The left side is the most commercial, with a variety of shops, restaurants, and bars. The right side, on the other hand, is more residential and quiet.

L'Eixample is also home to the famous Avenida Paseo de Gracia, where some of Barcelona's most luxurious fashion shops and several of the city's most important modernist buildings, such as Casa Batlló and La Pedrera, designed by the famous architect Antoni Gaudí.

In general, L'Eixample is a very lively and vibrant neighborhood, full of life and activity 24 hours a day. It is an excellent place to live or visit if you like to be close to the city center and enjoy the urban life.

host_about:
We’re Blueground, a global proptech company with several thousand move-in-ready apartments in a growing number of major cities around the world. With flexible terms and homes in vibrant, centrally based neighborhoods, you’ll feel at home and free to roam for as long as you want — a month, a year, or longer. 

Each apartment is thoughtfully designed with exclusive furnishings, fully equipped kitchens, and incredible amenities – making every day a five-star experience. From day one, you’ll enjoy high-speed Wi-Fi, premium linens, and smart home entertainment. Plus, access to pools, gyms, and outdoor spaces in select buildings.

Why stress over your apartment? We provide a hassle-free alternative — a consistent, quality guest experience that starts even before you arrive. Because we let you book our most up-to-date apartment listings online, confirm with a click, pay securely, and check in easily. 

During your stay
Upon arrival, you’ll either be greeted personally by a Blueground team member or given self-check-in instructions. The entire apartment is yours! You’ll enjoy reliable support via email, phone, and our Guest App, where you can request everything from a home cleaning to extra towels. 

We’ll share all details upon confirmation of your stay.

it will be nice to have you as a home. in a family atmosphere.

name: Blueground | Nova Esquerra de l'Eixample, kitchen
neighborhood_overview:
This busy district in central Barcelona is characterized by wide streets and an elegant atmosphere. L'Eixample is known for its Art Nouveau architecture, including buildings by Antoni Gaudí, and the shopping and dining around the Plaça de Catalunya and along Passeig de Gracia.
La Nova Esquerra de l'Eixample is a multicultural neighborhood with a wonderful international dining scene. Local museums include Casa Golferichs and Penitenciari La Model. The neighborhood is also home to Joan Miró Park, the setting for the artist's famous "Woman and Bird" sculpture.

name: Apartamento céntrico y moderno en Barcelona (S2)
description:
Welcome to our charming building located on the semi-ipeatonal street Consell de Cent, awarded by the prestigious TIMEOUT magazine as the TENTH most beautiful in the world !!!
Enjoy the authentic Barcelona life with charming restaurants, cafes, and shopping. Perfectly connected with iconic sites such as the Sagrada Familia (15 minutes), Casa Batlló and La Pedrera (10 minutes), the Gothic Quarter (12 minutes) and the beaches of Barcelona (25 minutes). We look forward to welcoming you.
host_about:
Soy Joan, un apasionado viajero amante del intercambio cultural. Soy de Barcelona y por mucho tiempo me he formado y trabajado en el sector hotelero. Mi vocación por el servicio y la hospitalidad a los turistas me ha llevado a crear un pequeño negocio con el objetivo de ofrecer las mejores experiencias posibles a los turistas que llegan a Barcelona. 

Junto con mi equipo haremos que  se sientan como en casa.

name: Sweett | Bailen 302
description: This spacious two-bedroom Sweett apartment offers a warm and inviting ambience. Bucolic wallpapers give a charming look to the space. Unwind with a refreshing drink or soak up the sun on the balcony after a day of touring. The kitchen is fully equipped and great for cooking family meals. Situated in the heart of Barcelona, many of the city's famous landmarks like the Sagrada Familia and Plaza Catalunya are within walking distance.
neighborhood_overview: A modernist treasure trove full of elaborate and often fantastical buildings, elegant landscapes and upmarket fashion - there’s really something magical about Eixample.  The area sits on the right hand side of Passeig de Gràcia, the main boulevard that separates the city.  Its gridded layout keeps things nice and simple for walking around - most tourists flock to Gaudi’s emblematic Sagrada Familia church, but Eixample itself is a peaceful, residential neighbourhood that offers many an opportunity for a quite respite.  You could easily spend the day just popping in-and-out of the various artist galleries, small boutiques and neighbourhood cafes scattered about, that is if you can tear yourself away from the high-end shops that line the avenues.  To top it all off, Eixample is only two metro stops away from Placa Catalunya at the city centre.
host_about: Sweett (formerly Sweet Inn) invites you to enjoy comfort, convenience, and local charm in our thoughtfully designed apartments. With 10+ years of hosting experience, we ensure a home-like stay with cozy bedding, fast WiFi, and a Nespresso machine. Our 24/7 team assists with early check-ins, transfers, housekeeping, and local tips. Enjoy welcome treats, personalized recommendations, and our smart app. Sweett is your perfect base for urban escapes.

neighborhood_overview:
Sarrià is the neighbourhood par excellence of Barcelona. It retains the traditional taste and the personality of lifelong neighbours. A district of shops and mansions but also green parks, health institutions and prestigious schools. Walking around Sarrià is always a pleasure and a reunion with the past.

The Sant Gervasi district is mainly a residential area which is very well connected to the rest of Barcelona. It is very close to the traditional neighbourhood of Gracia and the well-known Eixample district. The area has many shops, cafes, bars and different restaurants.

Enjoy welcome treats, personalized recommendations, and our smart app. Sweett is your perfect base for urban escapes.

Newly reformed 90m² apartment in the heart of the old town of Barcelona. You are literally 5 minutes walk away from the Cathedral & the famous Ramblas and right next to the townhall. 5 minutes in the other direction and you are by the port.
The flat kept original features like wooden beams in the living room which makes it a stylish but comfy experience at this centrally-located place.
neighborhood_overview: Barrio Gótico – Spanish for Gothic Quarter – is one of the oldest and most beautiful districts in Barcelona. A labyrinth of narrow streets full of atmospheric bars, restaurants and shops, the neighborhood is part of the wider old city and is situated right in the heart of Barcelona, stretching from the famous Rambla to Via Laietana.

neighborhood_overview: Colmena is strategically located in Ronda del General Mitre, just a few minutes from everything you might need. Parc Güell—a world heritage site, is a five-minute drive for those who’d like to escape the bustling city. The Sagrada Familia—the largest, unfinished and jaw-dropping Catholic church, is five metro stops away for any architectural enthusiast. Las Ramblas—Barcelona's most famous and iconic boulevard, is only a ten-minute metro ride out. Locals and tourists flock to the street because of its unique atmosphere and numerous exciting places to visit in the city. Equipped with the latest technology, Colmena is the perfect hotel for travellers looking for a modern experience in Barcelona.

name: Happy by the sea
description: Disconnect from the routine in this accommodation within 30 seconds of walking distance from the white sand beach. Around you will find many authentic and trendy restaurants and cafes. The fresh market is two steps away if you feel like cooking and eating healthy. The newly renovated accommodation offers all the comforts to feel at home. We will be delighted to welcome and offer you an excellent stay by the sea in Barcelona, an option available to a few. Welcome :)
neighborhood_overview: La Barceloneta is one of the most desired areas of the city. If you want to have the sea in front of you, this is the place for you. The neighborhood is quiet and full of local businesses, supermarkets, exquisite restaurants, and coffee shops for work. Most streets are pedestrian and biking is wonderful. It is an area that invites you to relax and enjoy all its original charm. The walk on the beach allows you to go for a run at any time watching the sea and breathe in the salitre. It's easy to meet new people quickly as the atmosphere is very positive and friendly. A pleasant experience awaits you
host_about:
Hello to everyone :) As owners we love being able to offer our apartments during your experience in the wonderful city of Barcelona. We welcome all cultures, religions and tastes. For us there is no discrimination but respect. Perfection does not exist but we strive to offer good conditions for your stay to be very positive. The only thing we like to ask is for our guests to be happy and positive. See you soon!

_

neighborhood_overview:
El Raval is a dynamic neighborhood that offers cutting-edge exhibitions at the Museum of Contemporary Art of Barcelona (MACBA) and the adjoining Center of Contemporary Culture of Barcelona (CCCB). Bohemian bars, late-designed shops, and street art flood the surroundings. In the market of La Boquería, located in Las Ramblas, seafood, wine and tapas are sold. Casual cafes happen on Rambla del Raval. The Maritime Museum exhibits boat aftershocks in medieval shipyards.

The accommodation is located in the heart of the Raval neighborhood. 1 minute walk from the Sant Antoni Market and the Boqueria Market.

name: Modern Apartment with City Views
description:
☆Private Balcony
☆Family Apartment

This modern apartment is perfect for families or couples. With its own private balcony, you will be able to relax in the sun after a long day. The apartment is perfect for exploring as access to public transport is only a few minutes walk away, and it is very easy to get to restaurants and cultural hotspots.

Experience Barcelona With Us & Learn More Below!
host_about:
Hi there,

My name is Enrique and I am a Barcelona Local. I have always loved traveling myself, but also sharing the beauty and wonders of Barcelona with others, so a few years ago I started renting out 2 apartments to travelers coming to the city, always meeting everyone in person so I could share my insights and hidden secrets about Barcelona :)

Now I rent out a few more apartments and it is no longer just me, but we are a small team of people managing the apartments together, but with the same focus on personal and attentive services in authentic apartments that allow for the genuine Barcelona feel for your trip! We call our little team Stay U-nique, because of this focus on a unique feeling when staying with us.

If you have any questions, want to hear about an apartment or just say hi, don´t hesitate to reach out :)

Have a great day!
Enrique

name: Family Room 4 beds Private Bathroom outside
description:
Casa Jam Barcelona, feel at home and experience slow travel with us. We are a socially and environmentally responsible accommodation that cares for people and the planet.
All our family rooms overlook our private terrace, so they are quiet and safe. You will also find A/C and free WIFI. And a large shared kitchen and dining room.
The reception is 24 hours a day and where we will tell you everything about Barcelona and the vibrant neighborhood of Gracia.
neighborhood_overview:
Casa Jam is located in the popular neighborhood of Gràcia, one of the most distinctive areas of the city. The neighborhood is made up of small streets and squares full of life, most of them pedestrianized, with taverns, bars and restaurants, studios and theaters, dance and art workshops, shops and spaces with a personal touch that make them unique. Gràcia is also a neighborhood of innovation and creativity. In recent years it has become an example of small businesses and businesses that promote ecology and sustainable development: second-hand stores, ecological textile stores, bio bakeries, artisan ice creams, etc.

Despite the modernity of the area, Gràcia has a village atmosphere. The neighborhood still retains its traditional spirit and maintains an important social and cultural fabric of small businesses and lifelong residents. In fact, it was a working-class neighborhood and this favored frequent movements of protest and solidarity that are still very present. Its neighb

neighborhood_overview: The Bon Pastor neighborhood in the Sant Andreu district, where its 15,000 inhabitants have forged their own personality through the adversities and difficulties of its history, such as the Civil War and the economic crisis. The neighborhood is known for its industrial heritage and culture, including music, literature, and art. The current objective of the neighborhood is to balance the working-class tradition with technological development and guarantee its own personality while integrating into the dynamics of the city. Free time is devoted mainly to football and basketball, and AE Bon Pastor has been the replacement for street football, giving rise to players like Sergio García from RCD Espanyol.

neighborhood_overview: Welcome to the lively and multicultural neighborhood that is home to a captivating array of cafes, restaurants, and bars. name: Blueground | Pedralbes, furnished
description: Feel at home wherever you choose to live with Blueground. You’ll love this stylish Pedralbes furnished two bedroom apartment with its modern decor, fully equipped kitchen, and bright living room with great balcony views. Ideally located, you’re close to all the best that Barcelona has to offer! (ID #BCN92)
neighborhood_overview:
Les Corts is the fourth of Barcelona's 10 districts. Located in the western part of the city, the area is home to the lovely Parc de Cervantes and the world-famous Camp Nou stadium, home ground for the Barcelona FC soccer team. There is a variety of shopping and dining along Avinguda Diagonal, as well as along the smaller streets that branch of the avenue.
Elegant Pedralbes is characterized by elegant villas on tree-lined streets. The neighborhood is the setting for renowned architect Antoni Gaudí's Güell Pavilions, which sit at the entrance to the Jardines de Pedralbes. Another neighborhood highlight is the Gothic-style Monasterio de Pedralbes.
host_about:
We’re Blueground, a global proptech company with several thousand move-in-ready apartments in a growing number of major cities around the world. With flexible terms and homes in vibrant, centrally based neighborhoods, you’ll feel at home and free to roam for as long as you want — a month, a year, or longer. 

Each apartment is thoughtfully designed with exclusive furnishings, fully equipped kitchens, and incredible amenities – making every day a five-star experience. From day one, you’ll enjoy high-speed Wi-Fi, premium linens, and smart home entertainment. Plus, access to pools, gyms, and outdoor spaces in select buildings.

Why stress over your apartment? We provide a hassle-free alternative — a consistent, quality guest experience that starts even before you arrive. Because we let you book our most up-to-date apartment listings online, confirm with a click, pay securely, and check in easily. 

During your stay
Upon arrival, you’ll either be greeted personally by a Blueground team member or given self-check-in instructions. The entire apartment is yours! You’ll enjoy reliable support via email, phone, and our Guest App, where you can request everything from a home cleaning to extra towels. 

We’ll share all details upon confirmation of your stay.

name: Gothic Gem, Stylish Apartment in Barcelona
description: Immerse yourself in the charm of Barcelona's Gothic Quarter with this spacious and beautifully furnished two-bedroom apartment. Located in the heart of the city, this renovated apartment offers a true Spanish vibe, with easy access to the main points of interest. Fully furnished and equipped with all you need for a comfortable stay, this apartment promises a memorable experience in one of Barcelona's most historic and vibrant neighborhoods.
neighborhood_overview:
Barcelona's Gothic Quarter, also known as Barri Gòtic, is a historic and enchanting neighborhood located in the heart of the city. This neighborhood is famous for its labyrinthine streets, medieval architecture, and preserved Roman walls, creating a unique and mesmerizing atmosphere for visitors to explore.
The Gothic Quarter is a treasure trove of rich history, with its narrow alleys and winding streets leading to hidden squares, ancient churches, and picturesque courtyards. One can easily get lost in the maze of narrow streets, discovering hidden gems at every turn. The neighborhood is home to many landmarks, including the stunning Barcelona Cathedral, Plaça Sant Jaume, and Plaça Reial, which are steeped in history and charm.
Aside from its historical significance, the Gothic Quarter is also a vibrant and dynamic area that offers a diverse range of shops, boutiques, restaurants, and bars. From traditional Catalan cuisine to international flavors, there is something for ever
